name: Philips SPA8000B/94 120 watts 5.1 channel Multimedia Speaker
description:
Music, Movies And Entertainment
With 120W sound output and Bluetooth connectivity , these speakers are perfect for playing music, games, movies and online videos on your TV ,MAC and PC.
USB Direct for easy MP3 music playback
Thanks to the complete file transferability, you can easily enjoy the convenience and fun of accessing more digital music via the built-in USB Direct.

* This Philips SPA8000B Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Works with any Bluetooth-enabled device
Bluetooth is a short range wireless communication technology that is both robust and energy-efficient. The technology allows easy wireless connection to other Bluetooth devices, so you can play your favorite music from any smartphones, tablets or even laptops including iPod or iPhone on Bluetooth-enabled speaker easily.

* This Philips SPA8000B Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
5.1 Surround sound - Immersive sound experience
Be at the heart of the movie and gaming experience and totally immerse yourself in sound.
FM tuner for radio enjoyment
The built-in FM tuner lets you enjoy your favorite songs or news from your radio station every day. Simply tune into the station that you want to listen.
Perfect for MP3, PC, TV, CD and more
Connect your speakers to all your gear. A great way to listen to your MP3 player, PC, TV, CD, DVD and all your multimedia stuff.

It also features pre-installed USB functions that can be used to connect external media devices. Play your favourite music loud and clear when you bring home the Reconnect RAMSE2104 2.1 Channel Multimedia Speaker.

name: MARSHALL STANMORE II Bluetooth Speaker, Bluetooth v5.0, Qualcomm aptX wireless connectivity, Two 15 Watt Class D amplifiers, Multi-host functionality, Black
description:
THE LEGENDARY ONE
Stanmore II is the most versatile speaker in the Marshall line-up and is perfect for any room, big or small. It delivers on the promise of high-performance sound that is synonymous with the Marshall name.
 * This Marshall MS Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
LARGER THAN LIFE SOUND
Stanmore II is the most versatile speaker in the Marshall line-up and is perfect for any room, big or small. Built with advanced components, it produces clean and precise audio, even at the highest levels.
 * This Marshall Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
WIRELESSLY CONNECT
Bluetooth 5.0 and aptX technology provides lossless wireless sound at a range of up to 30 feet while maintaining connectivity. Use your Bluetooth enabled smartphone, tablet or computer to stream music directly to your speaker with no wires required.
 * This Marshall Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC MARSHALL DESIGN
Classic Marshall details such as a textured vinyl covering, salt and pepper fret and the iconic script logo adorn this speaker's sturdy wooden frame. Located on the front of the speaker is a brass plate, etched with the establishment date of 1962- a subtle nod to the brand's heritage and over 50 years of loud. You'll want to proudly display this speaker in any room.
 * This Marshall Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CUSTOMISE YOUR SOUND
Fine-tune your music to meet your requirements with the Marshall Bluetooth app or the analogue controls on your speaker's top panel.
 * This Marshall Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CUSTOMISE YOUR SOUND
Fine-tune your music to meet your requirements with the Marshall Bluetooth app or the analogue controls on your speaker's top panel.
 * This Marshall Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MULTI-HOST FUNCTIONALITY
This speaker features multi-host functionality so you can easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth devices.
 * This Marshall Stanmore II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MARSHALL BLUETOOTH APP
In addition to the analogue control knobs, you can use the Marshall Bluetooth app to customize your listening experience or control the music you're listening to. Use the app to switch between EQ presets, set up stereo or ambient mode and adjust the intensity of the LED lights on the top panel. You can also wake up your speaker or put it into standby mode in a matter of seconds.

name: Marshall Kilburn II Bluetooth Speaker, More than 20 hrs of playtime,  Upto 30 feet range, Bluetooth 5.0 aptX technology, IPX2 water-resistant, Powered by 36 Watts, Black
description:
A STOUT-HEARTED HERO
Get on the road with Kilburn II. Free from the confines of wires and cords, this Bluetooth speaker offers 20+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
20+ HOURS OF PORTABLE PLAYTIME
Kilburn II weighs just 2.5 kg and offers 20+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Its compact size and guitar inspired carrying strap make it perfect to take with you. You can track the speaker’s battery life with the visual battery indicator located on the top panel of the speaker.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MULTI-DIRECTIONAL SOUND
This stout-hearted hero offers a larger than life multi-directional sound that will immerse you in your music, indoors or out. Powered by 36 Watts, its pronounced and articulate sound pushes the boundaries for a speaker of this size.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
BLUETOOTH 5.0 APTX
Kilburn II comes equipped with Bluetooth 5.0 aptX technology for wireless music play. Play music with any Bluetooth device at a range of up to 30 feet away from the speaker

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
DURABLE AND ROADWORTHY DESIGN
Kilburn II features flush mounted corner caps and a water-resistant design, making it supremely rugged and durable.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
IPX2 WATER-RESISTANT DESIGN
Kilburn II has an IPX2 water-resistant rating, so it’s able to withstand a little water.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MULTI-HOST FUNCTIONALITY
Kilburn II features multi-host functionality so you can easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth devices.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CUSTOMISE YOUR SOUND
Kilburn II’s top panel features analogue control knobs for bass, treble and volume, allowing you to fine-tune to the exact sound you desire.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
QUICK CHARGE
Kilburn II has quick charging capabilities so you can pick up and leave at a moment’s notice. 20 minutes gets you 3 hours of portable playtime, while a fully charged battery can be reached in 2.5 hours.

* This Marshall MS-KLBN2 Speaker is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description:

Loud
Amazing sound quality from the pocket dynamo. SoundMate brings you the most beautiful music ever with mega bass, making you feel like in the ocean of music with its 3W 

Output.

name: Marshall Woburn II Bluetooth Speaker, Multi-host functionality, Bluetooth 5.0, aptX technology, 10 metres range, 3.5 mm Jack, LED lights, Stereo Sound, Bass-reflex, Two 50 Watt Class D amplifier Black
description:
THE POWERFUL PERFORMER
The largest speaker from Marshall, Woburn II features a robust sound and hits high trebles cleanly, handles low bass with ease and has a clear, lifelike mid range.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
LARGER THAN LIFE SOUND
Woburn II hits high trebles cleanly, handles low bass with ease and has a clear, lifelike mid range. Two 1 inch tweeters and dual 5.25 inch subwoofers are individually powered by class D amps for a total of 110 watts of power. The wooden cabinet construction helps provide a warm, natural sound and the bass reflex system includes a port to increase efficiency at low frequencies.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
WIRELESSLY CONNECT
Bluetooth 5.0 and aptX technology provides lossless wireless sound at a range of up to 30 feet (10 metres) while maintaining connectivity. Use your Bluetooth enabled smartphone, tablet or computer to stream music directly to your speaker with no wires required.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC MARSHALL DESIGN
Classic Marshall details such as a textured vinyl covering, salt and pepper fret and the iconic script logo adorn this speaker's sturdy wooden frame. Located on the front of the speaker is a brass plate, etched with the establishment date of 1962 – a subtle nod to the brand's heritage and over 50 years of loud. You'll want to proudly display this speaker in any room.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CUSTOMISE YOUR SOUND
Fine-tune your music to meet your requirements. Just use the Marshall Bluetooth app or the analogue controls on your speaker's top panel to perfect your sound according to the room you're in.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
WIRED CONNECTIVITY
There are more ways to connect than just Bluetooth 5.0. Plug into the RCA or 3.5 mm input for an analogue listening experience.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MULTI-HOST FUNCTIONALITY
This speaker features multi-host functionality so you can easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth devices.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MARSHALL BLUETOOTH APP
In addition to the analogue control knobs, you can use the Marshall Bluetooth app to customise your listening experience or control the music you're listening to. Use the app to switch between EQ presets, set up stereo or ambient mode and adjust the intensity of the LED lights on the top panel. You can also wake up your speaker or put it into standby mode in a matter of seconds.
 * This Marshall MS Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve Plus Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Mic, Black
description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Deep. Loud. And immersive, too.
Meet SoundLink Revolve+, our best performing portable Bluetooth speaker yet.
This true 360 degree speaker was engineered to spread deep, jaw-dropping sound in every direction. That means, when everyone stands around it, everyone gets the same experience. If you set it near a wall, sound will radiate and 

reflect around the room, immersing you in that same feeling you felt at your favourite concert. And with a flexible handle, it's designed to go wherever you want to bring the music.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This video is for illustration purpose only.

More to hear. More to share. .
Don’t let its size fool you. This pint sized enclosure is packed with more technology than meets the eye. A highly efficient transducer. Dual-passive radiators. An omnidirectional acoustic deflector. All of which simply means 

you'll get lifelike sound… and real-life goosebumps.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Sings In The Rain.
You're not afraid of a little water. Your speaker shouldn't be either. SoundLink Revolve's water-resistant design means that you can use it in more places without worrying, like at the pool or by the kitchen sink.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Bumpers For Bumping.
You're not perfect. And with this speaker, you don't need to be. No worries if you knock it over, toss it in your bag or set it down a little harder than you meant to. Soft materials let you bump without worrying.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

All Sound. No Seam. .
No detail is too small. Not even a single seam. Notice that our grille doesn't have one. That's because we created a new single-extrusion process to eliminate it-leaving nothing but beauty.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Totally Tote-Able.
A flexible fabric handle makes SoundLink Revolve+ easy to move. And it feels good, too. That's because we meticulously chose every material for this speaker-right down to the soft, smooth buttons that ensure that every 

interaction feels as natural as you know it should.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Packed With Power.
A portable Bluetooth speaker needs impressive battery life. This one delivers. The rechargeable lithium-ion battery plays up to 16 hours: for full-day listening. Sure, some other speakers may play longer, but not without 

compromising the deep, powerful bass you’ll get from ours.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Leave Your Phone Alone.
Don’t have your phone handy? Don’t worry. You can still book a table for dinner or send a text message. Just press and hold the multi-function button to access the voice input for your phone's Siri or your Google Assistant right 

from the speaker. Problem solved.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

One App. Complete Control. .
The Bose Connect app gives you easy access to everything your product has to offer. Get tips, unlock product features and personalise your settings, so you can spend more time enjoying the music instead of setting it up.
You can also easily manage your speaker’s Bluetooth connections with a single swipe, so everyone can have a turn being the DJ. And when loud just isn’t loud enough, turn it up with Party Mode to play two wireless speakers 

simultaneously. Or switch to Stereo Mode for dedicated left and right playback, giving you a full and dynamic surround sound experience.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Your Music. Ready To Go. .
An optional charging cradle keeps your SoundLink Revolve charged and ready. It’s a convenient home base for your speaker, and you can play your music while it charges. Just plug the wall charger included with your speakers 

into the cradle.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Voice Prompts.
Make a connection. It’s easy. Voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing. You can connect to two devices-and the speaker remembers the eight most recently connected devices.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Speakerphone.
You’ve seen it before. Everyone crowded around with one friend on speakerphone. You struggle to hear them, they struggle to hear you. Not anymore. SoundLink Revolve speakers let you take calls right through the speaker, so 

words are clearer and less muffled.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Siri & Google Voice Commands.
Don’t have your phone handy? Don’t worry. Just press and hold the multi-function button to access the voice input for Siri or your Google Assistant right from the speaker.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Water-Resistant.
SoundLink Revolve's water resistant design means that you can use it in more places without worrying. With extensive testing and an IPX4 rating, we've ensured your speaker will long outlast an accidental showering of 

water.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Battery.
A portable speaker needs impressive battery life. This one delivers. The rechargeable lithium-ion battery plays up to 16 hours.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Threaded Universal Mount.
No surface? No problem. A universal thread lets you attach SoundLink Revolve to just about any tripod.

* This image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Beats Pill+ Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Black
description:
Feature rich and compact in design the Beats Pill+ Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker lets you experience unbeatable music quality, easy-to-use functions and unmatched style. With just 3 hours of quick charge, this speaker can work up to 12 hours of continuous play. Moreover, the stereo active 2-way crossover system creates an optimized sound field for dynamic range and clarity across all genres of music.
All Day. Every Day.
The Beats Pill+ speaker has up to 12 hours of battery life to stay charged on the go. Get a quick charge in 3 hours with the Lightning cable and even charge your phone or external music device with extra power from your Beats Pill+. The LED fuel gauge lets you know how much battery is left.
Designed Around You.
The no-nonsense interface gets you to your music fast. Play, pause, skip tracks, and control your phone calls with a touch of the multifunction “b” button. The enhanced speaker phone lets you make and receive calls with clarity.
Sound Bigger Than Its Size
The stereo active 2-way crossover system creates an optimized sound field for dynamic range and clarity across all genres of music. Tweeter and woofer separation uses the same acoustic mechanics found in professional recording studios around the world.
Beats Pill+ App
Download the Beats Pill+ app* to unlock features that put you and your friends at the center of your music like never before. Bring a second speaker into the mix for even fuller sound or sound in stereo. *Available 
only on the iPhone 5s or later, iPad Pro, iPad Air (all models), iPad mini 2 or later, and select Android 
devices.
DJ The Playlist
Grab a friend and control the music from two Bluetooth sources.
Amplify Your Sound
Add a second Beats Pill+ into the mix and simultaneously play from both speakers for a sound that’s twice as full.
Put It In Stereo
Sync two Beats Pill+ speakers together for dedicated left and right playback and an even more dynamic sound experience.

Designed Around You
The no-nonsense interface gets you to your music fast. Play, pause, skip tracks, and control your phone calls with a touch of the multifunction “b” button. The enhanced speaker phone lets you make and receive calls with clarity.

name: Logitech Ultimate Ears Wonderboom Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Fireball
description:
Functional and stylish, the Ultimate Ears Wonderboom Bluetooth Speaker is equipped with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery that allows you to enjoy break-free music for 10 hours. With its Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily connect your smartphone and enjoy your favorite songs. Sporting a compact design, this waterproof speaker can be carried around with ease.
Wonder­Boom
Ultimate Ears WONDERBOOM is the super-portable Bluetooth speaker with surprisingly big sound.
Hear Your Music Like Never Before
WONDERBOOM is your go-to accessory for conjuring the magic out of music. Enjoy 360 sound that is bright, beautiful and with balanced bass.
The Greatest Thing For Baths Since Bubbles And Duckies
Completely waterproof, floats, and -yes- WONDERBOOM will even serenade you. And it is also great for showers, pools, beaches, muddy fields and rainy days. If it gets dirty, just rinse it off.
Be There All Day, All-Night
From picnics in the park to binge-watching your favorite shows, WONDERBOOM gives you 10 hours of non-stop musical ecstasy. 10 hours of brilliant, immersive sound.
Easy Play, Pause, Skip
Control your music right from the speaker. Pressing the Ultimate Ears/UE button on the top of the speaker lets you easily play, pause, and skip song.
Double Up To Double The Fun
If you think one Ultimate Ears WONDERBOOM speaker sounds great, you'll love how two of them sound together. Then turn things up, get a little crazy and dance like nobody's looking. Wherever you are.
Virtually Indestructible
WONDERBOOM is drop proof tested from up to five feet and sports a hanging loop on top so it can easily attach to any bag, bicycle, backpack or cannonball into a cove without thinking twice.
Waterproof
Waterproof and dustproof - IP67 rated: WONDERBOOM can be immersed in liquid up to 1 m for up to 30 minutes.
360° Sound
Maximum sound level: 86 dBC  Frequency range: 80 Hz - 20 kHz.  Drivers: two 40 mm active drivers and two 46.1 mm x 65.2 mm passive radiators.
Power
Rechargeable lithium-ion battery for up to 10 hours of battery life between micro-USB charges. Charge time: 2.8 hrs.
Wireless Capabilities
Pair up to 8 Bluetooth enabled source devices. Connect up to two source devices at the same time.  Wirelessly play (stream) to 2 WONDERBOOM from one source.
Wireless Range
Mobile range for music playback is up to 33 m (100ft).

name: Philips BT51 Bluetooh Speaker Pink
description: Enjoy a powerful and wireless music experience with the high performing Philips UpBeat BT51A Portable Bluetooth Speaker. The Bluetooth connectivity allows you to connect very easily to other devices and enjoy your favorite songs while the compact and portable design allows you to carry the speaker wherever you go without any inconvenience. The speaker possesses a high performing battery for longer playback while the battery can be charged completely in a short duration.Tiny speaker. Crisp sound. Weighing just 90 g, you'll barely notice you're carrying this tiny speaker. The 1.5" full-range driver delivers crisp, clear sound even when you turn the volume up. 6 hrs play time. USB charging. The battery gives you 6 hours play time from a full charge. Charging takes less than 3 hours, and is easy via the included micro USB cable. Bluetooth connectivity Pairing with your Bluetooth device is simple. Just power on the speaker and it's ready to pair. The wireless range is 10 m. Anti-clipping function Anti-Clipping lets you play music louder and keeps its high quality, even when the battery is low. It accepts a range of input signals, from 300mV to 1000mV and keeps your speakers safe from damage by distortion. This built-in function monitors the musical signal as it goes through the amplifier and keeps peaks within the amplifier's range, preventing the audio distortion caused by clipping without affecting loudness. A portable speaker's ability to reproduce musical peaks decreases along with battery power, yet anti-clipping reduces peaks caused by low battery, keeping music distortion free.

name: Philips BT2505R/94 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Red
description:
The Philips BT2505B/94 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker offers you to play music out loud - anytime, anywhere. The built-in rechargeable battery lets you enjoy your personal music without the fuss of entangled power cords and the inconvenient search for an electrical outlet. This Philips docking speaker plays music from your Android powered devices via Bluetooth. The speakers also offers SD card provision. Digital Radio is a new way of broadcasting radio via a network of terrestrial transmitters. It provides listeners with more choices and information delivered in clear, crackle-free sound quality.
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Built-in rechargeable battery for music playback anywhere
Play music out loud - anytime, anywhere. The built-in rechargeable battery lets you enjoy your personal music without the fuss of entangled power cords and the inconvenient search for an electrical outlet. Enjoy great music with the freedom of portability now.
Built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls
With its built-in microphone, this speaker also works as a speaker phone. When a call comes in, the music is put on pause and you can talk via the speaker. Call for a business meeting. Or, call your friend from a party. Either way, it works great.


* This Philips BT2505 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Enjoy music from multiple sources


* This Philips BT2505 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Audio-in for easy connection to almost any electronic device


* This Philips BT2505 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Easy playback from MicroSD Card
Simply load the card with the desired content, plug it into your player – and never have to worry about running out of entertainment choices again.
Wireless music streaming via Bluetooth
Listen to all your favorite songs on a speaker that delivers fabulous sound. This Philips docking speaker plays music from your Android powered devices via Bluetooth. Simply download the free Philips DockStudio app and the Bluetooth will automatically be turned on and connect once when your device is docked. You get to enjoy powerful and outstanding sound, with unbeatable convenience. Hardly anything else sounds as good.
Carry it anywhere with the by-packed finely knitted strip
In line with the Philips CitiScape Strada's headband series, which was inspired by fashion sneakers and their vividly colored shoelaces, our by-packed strip is made of a vibrant and finely knitted fabric sleeve making it stylish enough to be a fashion accessory.
Built-in Digital FM radio
Digital Radio is, on top of FM analog transmission, a new way of broadcasting radio via a network of terrestrial transmitters. It provides listeners with more choices and information delivered in clear, crackle-free sound quality. The technology allows the receiver to lock on to the strongest signal it can be find. With digital stations there are no frequencies to remember, and sets are tuned by station name, so there is no returning on the move.

name: Amazon Echo Show 8 - Smart Display with Alexa - 20.32 cm (8 inch) HD Screen with Stereo Sound, Black
description: The Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker, Black connects to Alexa to provide you rich visuals on a 20.32 cm (8 inch) HD screen with a stereo sound, in a design that easily fits in any room in your house. You can ask Alexa to play your   favourite numbers while cooking or play latest news while having breakfast at the table. You can watch the latest music videos, news, movie trailers, and sports updates on the Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker, Black. You can   make hands-free video calls to smartphones with the help of Alexa app and Skype. You can also make voice calls, send messages, or instantly connect to other Echo devices in your home to make a quick announcement or check in   on the kids.   FROM THE MANUFACTURER  Introducing Echo Show 8 Echo Show 8 connects to Alexa to give you vivid visuals on a 20.32 cm (8 inch) HD screen with rich stereo sound - in a design that fits in any room in your home. Just ask Alexa to show your favourite TV shows, watch movies, play music with lyrics, show you weather updates, watch news bulletins, or control your smart home. It comes with a built-in camera, so just ask Alexa to make video calls to friends & family or monitor your kid’s room while doing your   daily chores. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Enhanced Entertainment Enjoy premium HD video with stereo sound as you watch the latest movies & award winning TV shows from Amazon Prime Video. Watch your favourite TV shows on Voot or music videos on Hungama Music. Enjoy   stereo sound experience while streaming music from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, JioSaavn, Gaana, Hungama & more. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Alexa Is Happy To Help Make your life easier at home. Use your voice to cook along with step by step recipes, set timers, add items to lists, and create calendar events and reminders. You can also check the news, weather, or traffic. Ask for sports scores, movie showtimes, restaurant hours, or information. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Hands-Free Video Calling And Messaging Echo Show 8 makes it easy to stay in touch. Make video calls to friends and family who have Skype, other Echo devices with screen, or the Alexa app. You can also make voice calls, send messages, or instantly connect to other   Echo devices in your home to make a quick announcement or check in on the kids. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Voice Control Your Entertainment Sing along to the lyrics of your favourite songs. Discover and enjoy music and videos as you stream directly from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, JioSaavn, Gaana or Hungama Music. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Voice Control Your Smart Home Enjoy hands-free control of your compatible smart home devices. Just ask Alexa to control smart lights, view security cameras, and create routines to let Alexa manage daily tasks like switching on the geyser or AC using smart   plugs. You can also manage your smart home devices via the simple interactive display on the screen. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. More Ways To Control Your Privacy Alexa and Echo devices are built with multiple layers of privacy protection. From the mic/camera off button and built-in shutter to the ability to delete your voice recordings, you have transparency and control over your Alexa   experience. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Alexa Has Skills Skills are like apps that add capabilities to your Echo device. You can listen to All India Radio, enjoy kids’ edutainment and games, stay updated with the latest news or learn something new with wikiHow. Just say “Alexa, help   me get started with skills. * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Simple To Set Up * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. Technical Details * This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Bose Portable Home Speaker, Upto 12 hrs of playtime, Spacious 360° Sound, Powerful Bass, Water-Resistant, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Connectivity, Multi-Room Functionality, Control With Voice, Triple Black
description:
OUR MOST VERSATILE SMART SPEAKER
The Portable Smart Speaker is a wireless home speaker, a portable Bluetooth speaker and a voice-controlled speaker, all in one. Around the house, you can move it from room to room - and when you leave your home, you can take it with you. Anywhere with Wi-Fi, you can control it with your voice and stream music directly from the cloud. Outside Wi-Fi range, you can control it like any other portable speaker with your mobile phone or tablet via Bluetooth and listen to anything you can play on your device. And no matter what you listen to or where you listen to it, you'll hear it all in 360 degrees of astonishing Bose sound. It's the home speaker you won't want to leave home without.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HEAR THE SOUND. FEEL THE DIFFERENCE.
Just like our SoundLink Revolve and Revolve+ speakers, the Bose Portable Smart Speaker is designed to radiate clear sound in all directions at the same time - but it's also engineered to pack a bigger punch, with deeper bass and more power. Put the speaker in the middle of the party and everyone can enjoy the same experience. Or place it in the corner of the room and the sound will feel like it's all around you.
"The Portable Smart Speaker has a sturdy, thoughtful design and it's a pleasure to use in any situation."
EXPLORE THE FEATURES
Clear voice pickup
A custom-designed microphone array can hear you speak even when the speaker's playing loud.
Truly wireless
Battery powered, so you can easily bring it with you all around your home or take it with you when you go. Plays for up to 12 hours per charge.
Durable and water resistant
Engineered to withstand bumps, drops, sprays, splashes and more.
Powerful bass
Three passive radiator deepen the bass by increasing the vibrating surface area
360-degree sound
Ultra-efficient, high-excursion transducer aims downwards into an acoustic deflector to radiate rich sound uniformly in every direction.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Say it to play it
Anywhere you can get Wi-Fi, you can use the Portable Smart Speaker as a voice-controlled speaker. With Google Assistant and Alexa, just say the word to stream all your favourite music, internet radio stations, podcasts and audiobooks. Plus check the weather, send messages, set timers, add to your to-do lists and control smart home accessories. And with Alexa only, you can even make calls to or take calls from Bose smart products, Amazon Echo products or anyone in your contacts list - hands-free, phone-free and free of charge.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Easy streaming
Play popular music services like Spotify, Amazon Music and Deezer on your Portable Smart Speaker anywhere you've got a Wi-Fi connection. Everywhere else, you can use Bluetooth to listen to anything your mobile phone or tablet can play. Apple users can also use AirPlay 2 to play audio from their devices too.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple setup and total control
Download the free Bose Music app to get instructions on how to set up your speaker step by step. Then use the app to easily browse through all of your music in one place, seamlessly jump between stations, playlists and services, and keep your speaker's software up to date. The Bose Music app also lets you group your Bose Portable Smart Speaker with any other Bose smart speakers or soundbars you have for a seamless audio experience throughout your home. Listen to different songs in different rooms, or one song in every room at the same time and get everyone singing along.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Even better all together
The Bose Portable Smart Speaker is part of the new family of Bose smart speakers, which includes the Home Speaker 300, the Smart Speaker 500, the Soundbar 500 and the Smart Soundbar 700. Start with one and add more at any time. Because nothing makes a home feel more homely than having every room filled with astonishing Bose sound.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
All charged up and ready to roll
This optional charging cradle accessory (sold separately) is the perfect home for your Bose Portable Smart Speaker. Keep your speaker's battery full when you're not using it - or keep the music playing even while you're charging it.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ADD MORE SOUND AROUND THE HOUSE
Want to listen to the same music in different rooms at the same time? You can always group two or more Bose Smart Speakers together - and now, with Bose SimpleSync technology, you can also group a Bose Smart Speaker with a Bose SoundLink Bluetooth speaker and play them both in perfect sync.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 * This BOSE Home Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description: The Itek BVS011_BL Smart Bluetooth Speaker, Black is extremely easy for you to take around with you because of its ergonomic design w hile the speaker. The Bluetooth connectivity allows you to connect seamlessly with other devices so that you can enjoy. It come with one touch voice assistant button. Also it comes with upto 6 hours playback time.

name: Sharp GX-BT180 Portable Bluetooth Speaker- powerful bass /10 h playtime - rechargeable battery/splash-dustproof /Call Answering (Google & Siri) Blue
description:
2.0 channel
With 2 channel stereo your Sharp audio device creates a spatial sound experience. Many music fans love precisely these acoustics, as instruments sound so authentic.
Bluetooth
Simple, fast, flexible: use Bluetooth to wirelessly connect your Sharp audio device to other devices such as your smartphone or tablet. Making your options even more versatile.
Micro USB operation / charging
Simply use the micro USB to run your Sharp audio device from the mains or charge it. You can also connect it, for example, to your laptop or power bank.
Duo-mode/True Wireless Stereo (TWS)
Twice as good: True Wireless Stereo (TWS) technology makes it easy to pair two Sharp speakers for, you guessed it, true wireless stereo. Not only do you get more volume or power but also a wider sound stage. By the way, control is also easy thanks to the duo mode: all you need is to connect your mobile device to one of the two speakers.
IP56 certified
Even if a bottle falls over or a glass spills over: you can stay calm. As your Sharp speaker is not only protected against dust, but also against strong water jets.
Built-in rechargeable battery
Up to 10 hours on the road listening to music: you can indulge in this pleasure with your Sharp audio device. Then quickly recharge it – and off you go again.

name: Infinity (JBL) Clubz 750 Dual EQ Deep Bass 20W Portable Stereo Speaker with 10 Hours Playtime, Built-in Powerbank, Bluetooth 5.0 and IPX7 Waterproof Black
description:
The Ultimate Party Speaker
Rack the party with monstrous top-quality sound! Perfect for your house parties and get-togethers, the Clubz 750 with Bass Radiator will keep the tunes going for 10 hours straight. Its smart design makes sure it can sustain all kinds of spills, drops and even dips. So leave it on the bar counter, the dining table or the poolside without having to worry.
Is the crowd getting bigger? Just pair it with another Clubz 750 with the dual-speaker connect feature and turn it up a notch. It doesn't stop there! You can also check the weather, change your playlist with voice assistants be it an EDM party, a jazz night or a melodious evening; you get the best out of them all with Dual Equalizer.
Still not convinced? The Infinity Clubz 750 is also a power bank that never lets your phone die. The Clubz 750 ensures that the party never stops!

name: Sony SRS-XB23 Wireless Extra Bass Bluetooth Speaker with 12 Hours Battery Life, Party Connect, Waterproof, Dustproof, Rustproof, Speaker with Mic, Loud Audio for Phone Calls (Black)

Backed by Sony’s newly developed X-Balanced Speaker Unit, these speakers provide high sound quality and powerful sound pressure for a richer, deeper, and more rewarding listening experience. The unit’s non-circular shape ensures maximum punchy bass, by increasing sound pressure around the speaker’s diaphragm.The new speakers added to the Extra Bass series have an IP67 rating which makes them dustproof, rustproof, and waterproof. The speakers are also saltwater resistant making them the best travel partners for a visit to a beach, forest, or dessert. The speakers spot a shockproof durable design which has gone through various levels of extensive shock testing and can withstand the inevitable knocks, bumps, and scrapes. The party connect feature lets one connect to 100 compatible wireless speakers with BLUETOOTH® technology to sync the music and lights to ensure everyone dances to the same beat. SRS-XB33 support EXTRA BASS sound which is achieved on the XB wireless speaker line up through Sony’s renowned audio technology. Backed by Sony’s newly developed X-Balanced Speaker Unit, these speakers provide high sound quality and powerful sound pressure for a richer, deeper, and more rewarding listening experience. The unit’s non-circular shape ensures maximum punchy bass, by increasing sound pressure around the speaker’s diaphragm.The new speakers added to the Extra Bass series have an IP67 rating which makes them dustproof, rustproof, and waterproof. The speakers are also saltwater resistant making them the best travel partners for a visit to a beach, forest, or dessert. The speakers spot a shockproof durable design which has gone through various levels of extensive shock testing and can withstand the inevitable knocks, bumps, and scrapes. With built-in Google Assistant manage your day, simply by asking your assistant, enjoy entertainment, connect with friends, get information, listen to music and notifications, set reminders and much more through hands-free, voice-controlled experience. The built-in microphone in the speakers allows it to catch ambient sound competitively and ensure a seamless hands-free music experience. Switch effortlessly between songs and calls by just pressing the multi-function button and a built-in mic enables you to take hands-free calls from selected smartphones. The music festival atmosphere created by the speaker. name: All-new Amazon Echo Dot (4th Gen)
description:
Meet the all-new Echo Dot
Our most popular smart speaker now comes in a refreshed, compact design that fits perfectly into any room. It delivers loud, crisp sound with improved bass that you can enjoy anywhere in your home.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Meet Alexa, the brain behind Echo Dot
Alexa, the brain behind Echo Dot, is built in the cloud, so it is always getting smarter. The more you use Dot, the more Alexa adapts to your speech patterns and vocabulary. Using Alexa is as simple as asking a question – just ask and Alexa will respond instantly.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your music
Echo Dot streams music from Amazon Prime Music, JioSaavn, Gaana, Hungama Music and Spotify - just ask for your favorite artist or song, or request a specific genre or mood. Access songs in Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil, Punjabi, Marathi, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Kannada and more. With Amazon Prime Music and Spotify, you can also create and manage your personal playlist.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your home
Use Echo Dot to switch on the AC from the bed or dim the lights from the couch– completely hands-free. Or, set schedules to turn on the Geyser every morning at 7AM or turn mosquito repellent off at sunrise. You can also use Echo Dot to control Fire TV - just say “Alexa, find comedy movies on Fire TV.”

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Make everyday easier
Make your life easier at home. Set timers, ask questions, add items to lists, and create calendar events and reminders. You can also pay your utility bills - electricity, mobile phone, gas, internet and more - using Alexa. Just ask, “Alexa, pay my bills.”

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Designed to protect your privacy
Alexa and Echo devices are built with multiple layers of privacy protection. Echo smart speakers have a microphone off button that electronically disconnects the microphones. You also have control over your voice recordings and can view, hear, or delete them at any time. Learn more about privacy.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa has skills
Alexa has more than 30,000 skills & counting. These skills add capabilities to help you do more with your Echo device. They can help you stay updated with latest news, listen to music, radio & podcasts or access stories, recipes, movie reviews and more from your favourite brands. You can also create your own personal skills & responses with Alexa skills blueprints.
Shop with Alexa
Alexa makes it easy and convenient for you to shop on Amazon. Build your shopping list with Alexa, get products information and prices, check out latest deals, reorder your past purchases, add items to your cart, check status of your orders, get delivery notifications and more. Alexa is always ready to help you save time and money for your shopping needs.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to set up and use

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Every day is an earth day
You don’t have to be an environmental scientist to make sustainable choices. We integrated sustainability in the design of this device. Here’s how:
Materials
50% of the plastics used are post-consumer recycled plastics. 100% of the fabric used is post-consumer recycled fabric. 100% of the aluminium used is recycled die-cast aluminium. Device, cable and adapter included.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Clean Energy
Amazon is building new wind and solar farms to produce clean energy equivalent to the electricity used by this device.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Device Packaging
98% of this device’s packaging is made of wood fibre-based materials from responsibly managed forests or recycled sources.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Low Power Mode
To reduce its energy consumption, this device will enter Low Power mode when it is idle. Low Power Mode is not available for certain user configurations.

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Technical Details

* This Amazon Eco Dot Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description:
Small in Size. Big on Bass
Go big on Sound and small on the size with the Clubz Mini. The handy design makes it as portable and travel-friendly as it gets.
Don’t let size fool you!
Weighing only 63.5g, this tiny beauty packs powerful immersive sound! With deep bass, Dual Equaliser, voice assistant & 5 hours playtime, this Bluetooth wireless speaker is a portable pocket-sized wonder.

name: Infinity (JBL) Clubz 150 Deep Bass Dual Equalizer IPX7 Waterproof Portable Wireless Speaker Black
description:
Be loud, be real and be light.
Unplug from connectors and enter into a world of unparalleled top-quality sound you can take everywhere you go. The rugged, compact and IPX 7 water-proof design will make sure the Clubz 150 can sustain all your coffee spills and careless drops. You can stream wireless music for up to 9 hours continuously with a quick charge. The Dual Equalizer feature lets you tap into a delightful musical experience with enhanced bass! Not just that, with deep bass sound that delivers just the best, let's tune into some real music!
The Dual connect feature lets you pair the Clubz 150 with another Clubz 150 for that added boost to your player! The Bluetooth Speaker also lets you connect to your voice assistants (Google Now / Siri) so you can check the weather, call a friend, listen to your favorite tracks. Let's get this party started!

name: Saregama Carvaan Mini Kids English & Hindi- Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, 80+ classic rhymes, 300+ famous stories, 15 phonetic learning content, supports Bluetooth, USB, Aux in ( Baby blue)
description:
Too much of screen time? Same old gifts for children? Kids always complaining of getting bored? Endless cartoon times?
We have a solution to all such similar problems. Saregama brings Carvaan Mini Kids - Chhota Bheem. If your child is a Chhota Bheem fan , this one is going to be perfect gift for him/ her. It is a portable audio player especially designed for kids aged between 2-10 years which comes pre-loaded with Stories, Rhymes, Learning topics and Mantras. It is compact, portable, light weight, child safe and easy to use that it needs no assistance from elders or parents to operate. When you want to switch from Stories to Rhymes or Learnings to Mantra, Bheem, Chutki and other Chotta Bheem character's attention catching and cute voice will make an announcement at the time of changing the mode.
It does not require internet to play and there are no ad breaks to interrupt your child's listening experience. The player is designed in a way that every child can independently operate and listen to favourite rhymes, stories or learn phonetics, alphabets, numbers or tables. Chutki, Bheem and all the other Chhota Bheem characters will ease your struggle to teach your child Gayatri mantra or Sai mantra or any other mantra. The dedicated mode for mantras will help the child start learning from an early age.
Carvaan Mini Kids - Chhota Bheem special edition is a complete package for your child's educational and playtime needs. It has 4 dedicated modes - Rhymes, Stories, Learning and Mantras. This helps in easy selection as per your child's mood and need.
Rhymes- the Rhymes mode has 80+ classic English and Hindi rhymes like Humpty Dumpty, Mary had a Little Lamb, Ringa Ringa Roses, Jack and Jill, Twinkle Twinkle, Chanda Mama Aao Naa, Lakdi ki Kaathi, Akad, Bakad Bambe Bo and many more to make your kid learn from.
Stories- Children often imagine better when they are listening rather than watching something. Give wings to your child's imagination, simply play stories and let your child think, visualize and enter a whole different world of stories. This mode has 300+ stories in English and Hindi like Panchtantra, Akbar and Birbal, Fairy Tales, Mythology, Lord Ganesha and many more.
Learning- It helps your child learn Phonetics, Days of the week, Months of a Year, Numbers, Tables, etc. with its 15+ pre-loaded and curated content library.
Mantras- It has 33+ mantras and devotional songs like Om Shanti mantra, Gayatri mantra, Hanuman Chalisa, Sai Dhun and more for your child to sing along and learn.
There is a special feature called Loop. Whatever your child likes to hear again and again, press the loop button given on top and it starts playing in repeat mode.
It charges with a Type C charger and has a battery backup of 4 hours. So just charge once and hand it over to the child to play around without worrying about charging it repeatedly.
And the other added features like Bluetooth, USB, and Aux In/ Out make it equally attractive for the parents too! So if you are lucky and your child lets you use it for some time, you can play your music too on these awesome speakers! It comes with 6 months warranty.
So take a first step towards gifting him his favourite character - Chhota Bheem and reducing screen time without compromising on learning. Gift them a Carvaan Mini Kids - Chhota Bheem.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve Plus II BT Multimedia Speaker with Up to 17 hours Battery, Triple Black
description:
* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Deep. Loud. And immersive, too.
SoundLink Revolve+ II is our best-performing portable Bluetooth speaker
This true 360° speaker was engineered to spread deep, jaw-dropping sound in every direction. That means, when everyone stands around it, everyone gets the same experience. If you place it near a wall, sound will radiate and reflect around the room, immersing you in that same feeling you felt at your favourite concert. And with a flexible handle, it’s designed to go wherever you want to bring the music.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
More to hear. More to share.
Don’t let its size fool you. This pint-sized enclosure is packed with more technology than meets the eye. A highly efficient transducer. Dual-passive radiators. An omnidirectional acoustic deflector. All of which simply means you’ll get lifelike sound… and real-life goosebumps.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Durable, water-resistant design.
You’re not afraid of a little water. Your speaker shouldn’t be either. SoundLink Revolve+ II’s water-resistant design means you can use it in more places without worrying about an accidental showering of water, like by the pool or the kitchen sink.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Bumpers for bumping
You’re not perfect. And with this speaker, you don’t need to be. No worries if you knock it over, toss it in your bag or set it down a little harder than you meant to. Soft materials let you bump without worrying.
All sound. No seam.
No detail is too small. Not even a single seam. Notice that our grille doesn’t have one. That’s because we created a new single-extrusion process to eliminate it - leaving nothing but beauty.
Totally tote-able
A flexible fabric handle makes SoundLink Revolve+ II easy to move. And it feels good, too. That’s because we meticulously chose every material for this speaker - right down to the soft, smooth buttons that ensure every interaction feels as natural as you know it should.
ADD MORE SOUND AROUND THE HOUSE
Want to listen to the same music in different rooms at the same time? You can always group two or more Bose Home Speakers together - and now, with Bose SimpleSync technology, you can also group a Bose Home Speaker with a Bose SoundLink Bluetooth speaker and play them both in perfect sync.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Packed with power
A portable Bluetooth speaker needs impressive battery life. This one delivers. The rechargeable lithium-ion battery plays for up to 17 hours - for listening all day long. Sure, some other speakers may play for longer, but not without compromising the deep, powerful bass you’ll get from ours.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Leave your phone alone
Don’t have your phone handy? Don’t worry. You can still book a table for dinner or send a text message. Just press and hold the multi-function button to access the voice input for your phone’s Siri or Google Assistant right from the speaker. Problem solved.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
One app. Complete control.
The Bose Connect app gives you easy access to everything your product has to offer. Get tips, unlock product features and personalise your settings, so you can spend more time enjoying the music instead of setting it up.
You can also easily manage your speaker’s Bluetooth connections with a single swipe, so everyone can have a turn at being the DJ. And when loud just isn’t loud enough, turn it up with Party Mode to play two wireless speakers simultaneously. Or switch to Stereo Mode for dedicated left and right playback, giving you a full and dynamic surround-sound experience.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Your music. Ready to go.
An optional charging cradle keeps your SoundLink Revolve II charged and ready. It’s a convenient home base for your speaker, and you can play your music while it charges. Just plug the wall charger included with your speakers into the cradle.

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
BOSE SPEAKERS
Find the perfect speaker for your outdoor adventure

* This Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: JBL Boombox 2 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Indoor and Outdoor Modes, Upto 24 hrs of playtime, IPX7 Waterproof, strong bass, Built-in 20,000 mAh powerbank, Black
description:
Own the party. From backyard barbecues to weekend road trips, JBL Boombox 2 brings it with monstrous bass, bold design and up to 24 hours of play time. IPX7 waterproof and portable, this powerful speaker pumps out massive sound all day and all night. Plus, you can connect other JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to turn the party up. JBL Boombox 2 keeps your friends dancing and its built-in powerbank keeps your devices charged. So you can groove from dusk till dawn and keep going strong!
The loudest JBL boombox ever
Turn it up. Way up. Get the loudest, most massive JBL Signature Pro Sound on our most powerful portable speaker, the JBL Boombox 2.






* This JBL Boombox 2 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Monstrous bass you can feel
Dance parties thrive on bass, so let your friends feel it. JBL Boombox 2 pumps out powerful, deep bass just like your favorite JBL powered club.


* This JBL Boombox 2 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Keep the party going with up to 24 hours of playtime
The fun doesn't have to stop. Packed with up to 24 hours of battery life, JBL Boombox 2 lets you party all day and all night.

description:
Cool, portable, and waterproof. The vibrant fresh looking JBL Clip 4 delivers surprisingly rich JBL Original Pro Sound in a compact package. The unique oval shape fits easy in your hand. Fully wrapped in colorful fabrics with expressive details inspired by current street fashion, it’s easy to match your style. The fully integrated carabiner hooks instantly to bags, belts, or buckles, to bring your favorite tunes anywhere. Waterproof, dustproof, and up to 10 hours of playtime, it’s rugged enough to tag along wherever you explore.

Wireless Bluetooth streaming
Wirelessly stream music from your phone, tablet, or any other Bluetooth enabled device.
10 hours of battery life

name: Amazon Echo (4th Gen) Smart Speaker with Dolby Technology, 2020 Release, Black
description:
Meet the all-new Echo
The all-new Echo delivers premium sound (powered by Dolby) and deliver clear highs, dynamic mids, and deep bass for rich, detailed sound that adapts to any room.
Just ask Alexa to play music, answer questions, make calls, tell you the news and more. Amazon Echo has been awarded as the best performing smart speaker by Digit in 2020.

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Meet Alexa, the brain behind Echo
Alexa, the brain behind Echo Dot, is built in the cloud, so it is always getting smarter. The more you use Dot, the more Alexa adapts to your speech patterns and vocabulary. Using Alexa is as simple as asking a question – just ask and Alexa will respond instantly.

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your music
Echo streams music from Amazon Prime Music, JioSaavn, Gaana, Hungama Music and Spotify - just ask for your favorite artist or song, or request a specific genre or mood. Access songs in Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil, Punjabi, Marathi, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Kannada and more. With Amazon Prime Music and Spotify, you can also create and manage your personal playlist.


* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your home
Use Echo to switch on the AC from the bed or dim the lights from the couch – completely hands-free. Or, set schedules to turn on the Geyser every morning at 7AM or turn mosquito repellent off at sunrise. Learn more about the magic of Alexa smart home. Echo also has built-in smart home hub which enables easy setup for selected smart home accessories like Philips Hue lights.

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Make everyday easier
Make your life easier at home. Set timers, ask questions, add items to lists, and create calendar events and reminders. You can also pay your utility bills - electricity, mobile phone, gas, internet and more - using Alexa. Just ask, “Alexa, pay my bills.”

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Designed to protect your privacy
Alexa and Echo devices are built with multiple layers of privacy protection. Echo smart speakers have a microphone off button that electronically disconnects the microphones. You also have control over your voice recordings and can view, hear, or delete them at any time.

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa has skills
Alexa has more than 30,000 skills & counting. These skills add capabilities to help you do more with your Echo device. They can help you stay updated with latest news, listen to music, radio & podcasts or access stories, recipes, movie reviews and more from your favourite brands. You can also create your own personal skills & responses with Alexa skills blueprints.

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Shop with Alexa
Alexa makes it easy and convenient for you to shop on Amazon. Build your shopping list with Alexa, get products information and prices, check out latest deals, reorder your past purchases, add items to your cart, check status of your orders, get delivery notifications and more. Alexa is always ready to help you save time and money for your shopping needs.

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to set up and use

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Technical Details

* This Amazon Echo Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Edgy Design, Ultra Portable
Fusing the best of style and substance, the Go 3 makes its mark with its edgy design, colorful fabrics, and expressive details. name: Saregama Carvaan Premium Marathi - Portable Music Player with 5000 Preloaded Songs, FM/BT/AUX, Up to 5 hrs playtime,With an Interactive App (Royal Blue)
description:
Saregama Carvaan Marathi is a portable digital audio player with in-built stereo speakers that comes with 5000 Marathi and Hindi film songs inside. With the option to tune into FM, Carvaan doubles up as your home radio too. You can also enjoy your personal collection of songs by plugging in a USB drive or streaming songs from your phone to Carvaan via bluetooth. It works on a rechargeable battery that lasts for approximately 5 hours. The product is backed by an all India service network, providing 1-year doorstep warranty support.
The 5000 songs music collection on Saregama Carvaan Marathi has been handpicked and categorized into music stations based on singers, music composers, moods etc. Each music station can be selected by turning a jog-dial. So literally, with the turn of a knob, you can switch from natya sangeet by Balgandharva to evergreen hits of the Mangeshkar family, to bhav geet by Arun Date, Manik Verma, Suresh Wadkar and others, to retro hindi by Kishore Kumar, Mohd. Rafi, Lata Mangeshkar and other legends - all in their original versions, back-to- back without any ads. What's more, Carvaan Marathi's music library also includes the entire Ameen Sayani's Geetmala countdown collection spanning 50 years as well as Geet Ramayan by Sudhir Phadke.
If you wish to tailor Carvaan Marathi's music collection even further to suit your preferences, that's an option too. Pick your choice from our range of 20+ thematic music cards spanning Natya Sangeet, instrumental and even Bollywood music. Plug the music card into the USB port on Carvaan. Bingo! Your music repository is now complete.
With its premium retro look, extensive content library, ease-of-use and warranty, Saregama Carvaan Marathi becomes the perfect gift for you and your loved ones.

name: Saregama Carvaan Premium Bengali - Portable Music Player with 5000 Preloaded Songs, FM/BT/AUX, Up to 5 hrs playtime (Royal Blue)
description:
Saregama Carvaan Premium Bengali is a portable digital audio player with in-built stereo speakers that comes with 5000 Bengali and Hindi film songs, folk songs, devotional songs and Tagore songs inside With the option to tune into FM/AM, Carvaan doubles up as your home radio too.
The 5000 songs music collection on Saregama Carvaan Bengali has been handpicked and categorized based on singers, music composers, moods, Tagore songs etc. Each music station can be selected by turning a jog-dial. So literally, with the turn of a knob, you can switch from Hemanta Mukherjee hits to poetry and songs by Kazi Nazrul, to retro hindi by Kishore Kumar, to Tagore songs all in their original versions, back-to-back without any ads. What's more, Saregama Carvaan Bengali has dedicated stations for Tagore songs covering his collections like Prem, Puja, Prakriti and Bichitro.
You can also enjoy your personal collection of songs by plugging in a USB drive. Alternatively, you can connect your phone or tablet to Carvaan using Bluetooth or an AUX IN cable. Carvaan works on a rechargeable battery that lasts for approximately 5 hours. The product is backed by an all India service network, providing 1-year doorstep warranty support.
With its premium retro look, extensive content library, ease-of-use and warranty, Saregama Carvaan Bengali becomes the perfect gift for you and your loved ones.

name: boAt PartyPal 23 15-Watt Bluetooth Wireless Speaker with Mic for karaoke, 4.5 hrs playtime, LED Lights (Black)
description:
Turn up the atmosphere and party from dusk till dawn with the boAt PartyPal 23. Fitted with Party Sound at 15W’s, turn your precious Friday’s into just what you need, a little stress release. The party rhythm never slows down with a Play-time of up to 4.5 hours, and a 2200mAh rechargeable lithium battery. It’s time to get really loud, with the microphone and recording feature that allows for memorable karaoke sessions. So, power through your week with the anarchic attitude of the PartyPal 23, the party speakers that just won’t give up. Connect to sensational sound and bring the 6.5 inch full range driver to life using Bluetooth V5.0, Aux, USB and FM Radio connection. Hold the speaker aloft and bring the dance party to life with the LED lit speakers that can be switched on with just the click of a button. Dynamic, Versatile and Powerful.
Up to 4.5 Hours of Party Time
At positively alarming reverb levels, with the power-packed 2200 mAh Lithium Battery made to make each party blast as though it were your last!
HD Party Sound
That gets loud! Turn up the atmosphere and redefine Friday nights with the powerful HD sound set that is the boAt PartyPal 23, made for you to power through your playlists.
Multiple Modes Of Connectivity
Compatible and can easily be paired with all types of devices that use Bluetooth technology.
Integrated Easy Access Controls
That allow for the boAt’s motions to be minimized on your journey to Nirvana, with easy integrated controls that control music and can even handle calling.

name: Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Smart Multimedia Speaker with Built-in Camera, Blue
description:
Introducing Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen)
Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) is an upgrade of our most popular smart speaker with screen and has the same compact, 13.97 cm (5.5-inch) display that customers love. It fits easily on your bedside or coffee table and blends into your decor with three color options - Black, White and Blue. With Alexa, you can control Echo Show 5 using just your voice - Alexa speaks English and Hindi.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Packed with Entertainment
Echo Show 5 is your personal entertainment corner: Watch latest TV shows and movies from Amazon Prime Video and Netflix or enjoy latest movie trailers from IMDB or simply catch up on news. Stream millions of songs in your favorite language from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, Spotify, JioSaavn, Gaana. Enjoy singing along with on screen lyrics from Amazon Prime Music. Kids can safely enjoy skills like Chu Chu TV, Chhota Bheem, Animal Sounds and more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Look in when you are out
Securely access the built-in camera to remotely monitor the room on your Alexa app or on other Echo Show devices - it's peace of mind wherever and whenever you want..



* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
Make your home smarter
Setup and manage compatible smart home devices with your voice or through the simple interactive display. Just ask Alexa to control smart lights, view security cameras, and create routines to schedule daily tasks like switching on the geyser or AC using smart plugs.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Hands-free video calling
Make hands-free video calls to friends and family having the Alexa or other Echo Show devices. Use drop-in feature to check on your kids or parents, by instantly connecting to Echo Show 5 via the Alexa app - just like an intercom.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Manage your day better
Echo Show 5 (2nd gen) helps you manage your day better. Set a reminder for your kid's dance class, create monthly grocery shopping lists, add items to your everyday to-do lists, set alarms, see weather forecasts, calendars and more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Pay your bills with Alexa
With Alexa you can pay your utility bills-electricity, mobile, gas, internet, water and more- with one voice command. Just say "Alexa, pay my bills".

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
More Ways to control your privacy
Alexa and Echo devices are built with multiple layers of privacy. For example, your voice is streamed to the cloud only after your device detects the wake word "Alexa". You can also turn the microphone off with the press of a button. And the built in cover lets you easily close the camera.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Skills are like apps that add capabilities to your Echo device. You can listen to All India Radio, enjoy kids edutainment and games, stay updated with the latest news or learn something new with wikiHow. Just say "Alexa, help me get started with skills."

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to setup

* This Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Every day is an earth day
You don't have to be an environmental scientist to make sustainable choices. We considered sustainability in the design of this device. Here's how:
Low Power Mode
To reduce its energy consumption, this device will enter Low Power Mode when it is idle. Low Power Mode is not available for certain user configurations. To learn more, see Low Power Mode Restrictions.
Materials
30% post-consumer recycled plastics. 100% post-consumer recycled fabric. 100% recycled die-cast aluminum. Device, cable and adapter included
Device Packaging
99% of this device's packaging is made of wood fiber-based materials from responsibly managed forests or recycled sources.
Clean Energy
Amazon is building new wind and solar farms to produce clean energy equivalent to the electricity used by this device.

name: All new Echo Show 10 (2nd Gen, 2021 release)
description:
Designed to move with you
This is the best Echo device we ever created. It has a revolutionary 25.65 cm (10.1 inch) rotating HD screen that automatically moves to face you. You can move around the room while watching tv shows, taking video calls or while singing along to lyrics on screen - the screen will automatically turn to face you.
Packed with entertainment
Echo Show 10 is an entertainment powerhouse: The 25.65 cm (10.1 inch) HD screen is perfect to watch latest TV shows and movies from Amazon Prime Video and Netflix or to enjoy latest movie trailers from IMDB or to simply catch up on news. Stream millions of songs in your favorite language from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, Spotify, JioSaavn, Gaana. Enjoy singing along with on screen lyrics from Amazon Prime Music. The 10W speakers deliver rich loud sound. Kids can safely enjoy skills like Chu Chu TV, Chhota Bheem, Animal Sounds and more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stay in frame during video calls
Make hands-free video calls to your friends and family without worrying about keeping yourself in frame. The 13 MP camera can pan and zoom to make sure you and your family are front and centre. You can make video calls to anyone having the Alexa app or other Echo Show devices.

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your home
Get started with magic of Alexa smart home. Setup smart lights, plugs or cameras with Echo Show 10 and control your appliances using just voice. Create routines to let Alexa schedule daily tasks like turning on the lights in evening and switching on the geyser in morning. You can also manage your smart home devices on the simple interactive display.

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Take a look around when you're away
Securely access the built-in 13MP camera to remotely monitor your home on the Alexa app or on other Echo Show devices. You can look around the room through pan and zoom functionality.
Echo Show 10 makes your life easy
With a screen that moves with you, Echo Show 10 is the perfect companion as you work out with Shilpa Shetty Yoga or cook along to your favourite recipes from Sanjeev Kapoor smart recipes. You can also manage your day better with Alexa through reminders, bill payment, Amazon shopping, alarms, weather updates and much more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Designed to protect your privacy.
Built with multiple layers of privacy controls, including a microphone/camera off button and a built-in cover to close the camera. Disable motion at any time by voice, on-device, or in the Alexa app. The processing that powers screen motion happens on device - no images and videos are sent to the cloud to provide the motion feature.

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to setup and use

* This Amazon Echo Show 10 Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Every day is an earth day.
You do not have to be an environmental scientist to make sustainable choices. We considered sustainability in the design of this device.Here is how:
Low Power Mode
To reduce its energy consumption, this device will enter Low Power Mode when it is idle. Low Power Mode is not available for certain user configurations. To learn more, see Low Power Mode Restrictions.
Materials
30% post-consumer recycled plastics. 100% post-consumer recycled fabric. 100% recycled diecast aluminium. Device, cable and adapter included.
Device Packaging
99% of this device's packaging is made of wood fibre-based materials from responsibly managed forests or recycled sources.
Clean Energy

name: Zebronics Zeb-Samba 4.1 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker With Supporting SD/MMC Card, USB, FM (Black)
description: Samba is a 4.1 multimedia speaker which has an LED display and aesthetic design with multi-colored LED lights which gives a good look and feel to the design scheme. It has multi-connectivity options like USB, SD/MMC, and BT. It has individual volume bass and treble controls will a built-in FM and a fully functional remote control.

name: Zebronics Zeb-JellyFish Pro 4.1 73 Watts Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker with Smartphone Control App, USB, SD Card, AUX, Built-in FM
description: Jellyfish Pro is a 4.1 speaker with an interesting design that is inspired by the mystical creature of the ocean, Jellyfish. The Pro model comes with a special feature that includes controlling the speaker with the smartphone app “Zeb Spk remote” available on the app store & play store. With the app, you can choose which multi-connectivity options you want to play from. You can set your favorite playlist, control bass, treble, volume, and the app also comes with preset modes like Jazz, Rock, Pop, Country. description:
ZEB-Music Bomb is a portable BT speaker that features a water resistant design with an IPX5 waterproof rating and adds a punch of bass. It has a playback time of 10 Hours. The portable BT speaker comes with controls for volume/ media and a call function button. It has multi-connectivity options like BT/USB /AUX with a TWS function and features a built-in FM Radio.


Take the music wherever you go with our compact yet powerful ZEB-Music Bomb portable speaker that features a water resistant design and adds a punch of bass with a playback time of 10 Hours elevating your audio listening experience.

name: Zebronics Zeb-Smart Bot Smart Speaker with Built-in IR Blaster & Alexa, Zeb Home App Control
description:
Zeb-Smart Bot is a smart speaker with an IR blaster. Stream your music wirelessly with Wifi and BT enabled ZEB-Smart Bot speaker or activate the voice control option by saying the word 'Alexa'. It has  dual far-field mics, built-in Alexa and a companion app Zeb-Home available on Playstore and App store. The wireless speaker has a 360 degrees IR blaster which can be used to control any device which has an IR remote.
Control IR Devices from anywhere
Voice control your TV, AC, or any device with Zeb-Smart Bot Smart speaker that features a 360 degrees IR blaster that can be used to  control any device which has an IR remote. Apart from voice control it can be controlled from Zeb-Home app as well.
Turn any Non-smart device with IR Remote to a smart device
Dual Far-field Mic
Zeb-Smart Bot portable smart speaker can hear you from across any room, including noisy environments or while playing music as it comes with dual far field mic and built in Alexa. So ask for the weather, play music or set a timer you can do it all with the smart portable speaker. When you want to use the voice controls simply say the word “Alexa” and it responds instantly.
360 Degree Remote Control
5 Watts Speaker
2.4 GHz Wi-Fi
