description:
Zeb-Music Deck is a BT portable speaker that comes in a uber-cool design that includes controls on the top. The speaker comes with 7.6cm drivers, dual passive radiators that give you a deep thumping bass. Want to double the power of music? pair another Music Deck over TWS to elevate your music experience. The speaker also has multi-connectivity options like BT/ AUX /USB/mSD and comes with a built-in FM Radio.
Wireless BT V5.0
Featuring BT v5.0 that provides seamless connectivity with low latency.
Multi-Connectivity
Enjoy wireless streaming via the BT Mode or choose any of the other modes including USB, AUX and mSD.
BASS BOOSTER
Dual passive radiators for powerful and thumping bass.
TWS FUNCTION
Pair two Music Deck speakers together and play your favourite music in stereo sound.
Small Yet Powerful
ZEB-Music Deck, which comes with dual 7.6cms drivers producing 12watts RMS output.The speaker also comes with dual passive radiators for a thumping bass in small form factor. You can also pair two of these together for a stereo sound experience.

To double the power of music add another Zeb-Sound Feast 300 via TWS function to amplify the sound experience.

name: Sony SRS-XB13 Extra Bass Wireless Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Black
description:
Compact speaker that expands sound all around
The SRS-XB13 is durable and portable. It comes with a specially engineered strap to make travelling with it easier. But don’t be fooled by its small size, with Extra Bass, Sound Diffusion Processor, this little speaker packs plenty of punch.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Enjoy powerful sound with EXTRA BASS
A passive radiator works together with a full-range speaker to enhance low-end tones, giving bass a boost.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Goes wherever you go
The durable exterior and multiway strap makes this speaker ready for just about anything. Hang it from your backpack or on your wrist or even from a parasol when you're out in the sun. The downwards-facing speaker will create a waterfall of music that engulfs you in the rhythm.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Small speaker, big sound
Don't be fooled by its compact shape, this little speaker packs major surround sound. The Sound Diffusion Processor expands sound in any space, with its DSP technology.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Take the fun outside
Waterproof and dustproof with an IP67 rating, this speaker is just as good outside as it is inside. Take it to the pool, river or park, and you can listen to your music while you and your friends enjoy the sun.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Epic party stamina
Get up to 16 hours of battery life to keep the party going. A new battery indicator, right on your smartphone, lets you know when it's time for a recharge.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Keep your hands free
Need to make a call? No problem. Whether you're at home or out and about, the built-in mic lets you enjoy hands-free calling straight through your speaker.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Bluetooth Connection and Fast Pair
In one tap, the Sony SRS-XB13 enables quick effortless Bluetooth pairing with you Android devices.
 * This Sony SRS XB13 Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Realme 3W Pocket Bluetooth Speaker with IPX5 Water Resistant, Dynamic Bass Bosster, Stereo Pairing Classic Black, RMA2007
description:
MUSIC, EVERYWHERE
A portable Bluetooth speaker made for life on the go. Take the realme Pocket and you'll be taking superb sound quality with you everywhere.
6 Hours of Playback Extra hours of fun.
It may be small, but it's got a big 600mAh battery. Featuring the popular Type-C port, say goodbye to the hassle of getting extra cables.
Big in small
Experiance rich, deep bass thanks to the 3W Dynamic Bass Boost driver that's combined with a passive radiator. Get ready for clear, dynamic audio—even if you're in the great outdoors. A passive radiator delivers richer sound without diverting energy toward amping up the bass.
IPX5 Water Resistant
Resistant against water sprays and splashes, it can also block winds at its waterproof level. Enjoy the more distance outdoors without fearing for the weather.
Stereo Pairing & Three Equalizer Presets
Pair up two speakers for an astonishing stereo experience. Available with three Equalizer Presets: Bass, Dynamic, and Bright to liven up your daily music adventure.
Game Mode
Switch to the game mode for  the perfect sync between video and audio while playig the games or watching movies.

It comes with 10W Bass Sound Output which creates great volume and can enlighten your party with great music and superb sound quality.TWS or True Wireless Stereo: This device is a great example for TWS or True Wireless Stereo. You can connect two speakers simultaneously. All you can do is activate TWS Mode and can connect two speakers where one speaker becomes the mother or main speaker and the other becomes child speaker which sync completely and create magic.Multiple Bluetooth Connectivity: Connecting your phone/laptop/tablet Bluetooth with the device is very easy. For power On/Off, all you need to just press the main button for 3 seconds to start the device. Then select the right device and pair it successfully and you can start playing your favorite music.Battery & Play Time: Portronics SoundDrum1 10W comes with 2000mAh battery capacity and it has 8 to 10 Hours of Playback time. You can experience 60% to 70% of more volume and with this device and all your parties will be musically memorable.12 Months' Warranty

name: boAt Stone 190 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with IPX7 Water and Dust Resistant, Iron Red
description:
Immerse in Nirvana with boAt Stone 190 wireless portable speaker. The speaker comes equipped with 52mm dynamic driver for an immersive audio experience. It supports instant wireless connectivity with the latest Bluetooth v5.0. One may elevate the surrounding vibes with Stone 190 in another way apart from the wireless functionality: it comes equipped with the provision for AUX connectivity as well. The lightweight ergonomics offers enhanced portability while on the move. Immerse into the realm of Nirvana wherever you are, with boAt Stone 190.
4 Hours of Playtime Per Charge
Its powerful 800mAh battery offers a playback time of up to 4 hours.
Quick Wireless Connectivity
Stone 190 is equipped with the latest Bluetooth V5.0 for quick wireless connectivity. It comes with multiple connectivity modes in the form of BT & AUX.

IPX7 Water and Dust Resistance
It has IPX7 marked shield for providing resistance against water and splash scares.
Easy Access Controls for Seamless User Experience
It has been ergonomically designed keeping in mind the enhanced portability while on the move. Stone 190 has easy access  integrated controls for seamless usage

name: Ambrane BT-83 10 Watt Portable Bluetooth Speaker with High Bass, Inbuilt Mic, SD Card & AUX-In Port and IPX6 Waterproof Feature (Black)
description:
Ambrane BT-83 is a portable Bluetooth speaker. It has True Wireless feature which enables it to cross connect with two speakers & play music simultaneously for stereo sound experience. At 10W output it produces powerful bass & HD sound. It comes with IPX6 Certification which makes it resistant to water & dust, making it a perfect companion for music & travel enthusiasts.
Bluetooth 5.0 
You can efficiently operate the speaker wirelessly within 10m distance as it is equipped with latest Bluetooth technology 5.0. Its wireless working is nicely complemented  by its lightweight design for portable use.
True Wireless Freedom for Amazing Sound Quality 
This Infinity speaker features true wireless working where you can enjoy a stereo sound experience as this speaker can play music while being connected to another speaker where music is played by both the speakers simultaneously. 
10W Output
The impressive drivers of this Bluetooth speaker help to deliver a powerful audio performance with 10W output. High bass and clear treble is promised by this Infinity speaker. 
2200 mAh Battery for Lasting Performance 
A reliable performance of working wirelessly for up-to 7 hours comes from a strong and durable 2200 mAh battery. The Infinity speaker can be used for hands-free calling or listening to music whenever you want.  
SD Card Support
To play saved music files, this Bluetooth speaker features an SD card slot. You simply have to insert your SD card into the slot and play music through it whenever you want 
IPX6 Certified
No more worries about dirt and water splashes while carrying the Infinity BT-83 Speaker outdoors as it meets IPX6 quality standards. Its performance and life is not hampered a bit due to these external conditions making this speaker perfect for adventure and other outdoor trips.

name: JBL CHARGE 5 Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Upto 20 hrs of playtime, IP67 Waterproof and Dustproof, PartyBoost feature, Built-in powerbank, Black
description:
Play and charge endlessly.
Take the party with you no matter what the weather. The JBL Charge 5 speaker delivers bold JBL Original Pro Sound, with its optimized long excursion driver, separate tweeter and dual pumping JBL bass radiators. Up to 20 hours of playtime and a handy powerbank to keep your devices charged to keep the party going all night. Rain? Spilled drinks? Beach sand? The IP67 waterproof and dustproof Charge 5 survives whatever comes its way. Thanks to PartyBoost, you can connect multiple JBL PartyBoost-enabled speakers for a sound big enough for any crowd. With all-new colors inspired by the latest street fashion trends, it looks as great as it sounds.
Bold JBL Original Pro Sound
Take the amazing power of JBL Pro Sound with you. The JBL Charge 5 has an optimized long excursion driver, a separate tweeter, and dual JBL bass radiators, all delivering impressively rich and clear audio. Get that big room sound, even when outdoors.
20 hours of playtime
The fun doesn’t have to stop. Packed with an incredible 20 hours of battery life, JBL Charge 5 lets you party all day and into the night.
IP67 waterproof and dustproof
To the pool. To the park. JBL Charge 5 is IP67 waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.
Wireless Bluetooth Streaming
Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns enjoying JBL Pro sound.
Crank up the fun with PartyBoost
PartyBoost allows you to pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to truly pump up your party.
Power up with the built-in powerbank
Don’t put the party on pause. A built-in powerbank lets you charge your devices without taking
a break from the tunes.

description:
Play and charge endlessly.
Take the party with you no matter what the weather. The JBL Charge 5 speaker delivers bold JBL Original Pro Sound, with its optimized long excursion driver, separate tweeter and dual pumping JBL bass radiators. Up to 20 hours of playtime and a handy powerbank to keep your devices charged to keep the party going all night. Rain? Spilled drinks? Beach sand? The IP67 waterproof and dustproof Charge 5 survives whatever comes its way. Thanks to PartyBoost, you can connect multiple JBL PartyBoost-enabled speakers for a sound big enough for any crowd. With all-new colors inspired by the latest street fashion trends, it looks as great as it sounds.
Bold JBL Original Pro Sound
Take the amazing power of JBL Pro Sound with you. The JBL Charge 5 has an optimized long excursion driver, a separate tweeter, and dual JBL bass radiators, all delivering impressively rich and clear audio. Get that big room sound, even when outdoors.
20 hours of playtime
The fun doesn’t have to stop. Packed with an incredible 20 hours of battery life, JBL Charge 5 lets you party all day and into the night.
IP67 waterproof and dustproof
To the pool. To the park. JBL Charge 5 is IP67 waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.
Wireless Bluetooth Streaming
Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns enjoying JBL Pro sound.
Crank up the fun with PartyBoost
PartyBoost allows you to pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to truly pump up your party.
Power up with the built-in powerbank
Don’t put the party on pause. A built-in powerbank lets you charge your devices without taking
a break from the tunes.

name: Apple HomePod mini with Siri assistant Smart Speaker, 360-Degree Audio, Easy to connect & control, Deep Bass, Orange
description:
* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
You’ve never heard colour like this.
Room-filling sound.
An intelligent assistant.
Control your smart home.
Works seamlessly with iPhone.
Private and secure.
Sound
Nothing short of amazing.
Jam-packed with innovation, HomePod mini delivers unexpectedly big sound for a speaker of its size. At just over 8 centimetres tall, it takes up almost no space but fills the entire room with rich 360‑degree audio that sounds amazing from every angle. Add more than one HomePod mini for truly expansive sound.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Boundary-pushing computational audio creates the full, detailed tones of a much larger speaker — and HomePod mini turns it up without missing your voice commands.
Crisp sound
An Apple-designed full‑range driver uses an incredibly powerful neodymium magnet to deliver deep bass and crisp high frequencies.
360‑degree audio
The unique acoustic waveguide directs sound out the bottom of the speaker, creating a 360‑degree audio field for consistent sound no matter where you are in the room.
Balanced at any volume
The tiny but powerful Apple S5 chip enables computational audio, which processes complex algorithms in real time, giving you balanced, fine‑tuned sound at any volume.
Bass extension
Apple-designed force‑cancelling passive radiators give HomePod mini incredible bass extension.
Noise cancellation
Four microphones work together to help cancel noise and listen for “Hey Siri” — even if your environment is loud, you don’t have to turn the volume down or move closer to be heard.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HomePod mini is designed to fit anywhere in the house. Its elegant shape is wrapped in a perfectly seamless mesh fabric that’s virtually transparent to the sound passing through it. A backlit touch surface on the top provides quick control.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
With multiple HomePod mini speakers placed around the house, you can have a connected sound system for your whole home.1 Ask Siri to play one song everywhere or, just as easily, a different song in each room.
Having powerful audio everywhere in the house couldn‘t be simpler — and each HomePod mini gives you total control, no matter where you are. HomePod mini also works with your Apple devices for features like Intercom, letting you quickly communicate by voice.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Pick up an incoming call from your iPhone, kick back with your favourite shows on Apple TV, listen to music on your Mac — HomePod mini works effortlessly with all your Apple devices and experiences to take your sound to the next level. You can even create a stereo pair — two HomePod mini speakers paired in the same room create left and right channels for fully immersive audio.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
If you’re enjoying music or a podcast and have to head out, you can continue to listen on your iPhone without missing a beat. Hand it off simply by bringing your iPhone close to HomePod mini. You’ll experience the feeling of your iPhone and HomePod mini connecting virtually as the sound transfers.2
Personalised listening suggestions will automatically appear on your iPhone when you hold it next to HomePod mini. You’ll have instant control at your fingertips without having to unlock your iPhone.3

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Intelligent assistant
Siri does everything like there’s nothing to it.
Siri is your do-it-all intelligent assistant that puts HomePod mini at the centre of your family’s activities. And with multiple HomePod mini speakers around the house, it’s easy to call on Siri from anywhere. HomePod mini and Siri can do even more by seamlessly connecting to your iPhone, and Apple Music Voice gives you access to every song in the catalogue — all with just your voice.



* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker  video is for illustration purpose only.
Hey Siri, play pop hits in the bedroom
Listen to tracks by song, artist, album, playlist, genre or lyrics.
Hey Siri, play NDTV, We The People
Listen to Apple Podcasts and radio stations.
Hey Siri, play top Hindi songs on Gaana
Stream content from third‑party services.4
Hey Siri, play workout songs on JioSaavn
Stream content from third‑party services.4
Hey Siri, how many millilitres are in a cup?
Convert units and measurements.
Hey Siri, add flour to the grocery list
Create lists and reminders. Siri will update them across all your devices.
Hey Siri, how long would it take me to get to the airport?
Get local information based on your location.
Hey Siri, find my keys
Locate your devices or AirTag items with a ping.
Hey Siri, text Megha, I’m about to leave
Send and receive messages, and make or take phone calls.
Hey Siri, close the blinds at 8 PM
Control smart home accessories like thermostats, lights and blinds.5
Hey Siri, is the front door locked?
Get the status of connected accessories.
Hey Siri, it’s film night
Create scenes that control multiple devices simultaneously with a single phrase.
Intercom spreads the word.
With more than one HomePod mini in the house, you can easily communicate with your family members by voice using Intercom. Ask Siri to send your message to the whole house or to individual rooms — and everyone can easily respond.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Hey Siri, announce, On my way home,
want me to pick anything up?
Intercom also works with your other Apple devices so you can send and receive messages through CarPlay while you’re driving, on your AirPods during a workout, or with your Apple Watch when you’re running errands.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Smart home
Easy to connect. Simple to control.
Whether you already have a smart home or are buying your first smart device, getting set up — and staying connected from anywhere — is a snap with the Home app and HomePod mini.5

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
When you set up HomePod mini, it’s automatically added to the Home app, and with just your voice you can instantly control any of your HomeKit devices.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HomePod mini can also act as a home hub, letting you control your HomeKit accessories remotely. Wherever you go, you can see a live view from the front door, shut your garage and lock or unlock the house through the Home app.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Looking to learn more about the benefits of a smart home? The Discover tab in the Home app is the best place to find out what’s possible, and get recommendations on top-rated accessories that work with HomePod mini.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Private and secure
A speaker that protects your right to privacy.
Privacy is essential — especially in your own home. HomePod mini is designed to keep your personal information safe and be a trusted assistant in your family’s everyday life.
 
HomePod mini only listens for “Hey Siri” — so you can speak freely knowing nothing you say is sent out of your home until you activate Siri with a touch or HomePod mini hears the magic words, “Hey Siri”.
When you ask Siri something, your request is associated with a random identifier, not your Apple ID.
 
With HomeKit Secure Video support, HomePod mini can analyse the feeds of your supported video cameras, detecting the presence of people and recognising familiar faces, pets and cars. All video processing is done right on your device before it’s sent end‑to‑end encrypted to iCloud — so your recordings can only be seen by you and the people you share them with, not Apple.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HomePod mini works with your iPhone for requests like hearing your messages or notes, so they are completed on device without revealing that information to Apple.

* This Apple MJ2C3HNA Multimedia Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

KING OF THE ROAD

Bring the show on the road with Tufton, the mightiest portable speaker from Marshall. Tufton packs 20+ hours of portable playtime, allowing you to go further, for longer. Bluetooth® 5.0 technology allows you to connect to a variety of wireless devices with a range of 30ft.

name: Inbase IB-1297 Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker with Up to 5 Hours Play Time, Black
description:
Inbase Boom Lite speaker is ergonomically designed and engineered for greater clarity, sound and offers big beats on the go. Long-lasting battery and playtime up to 5 hours on a single charge make it stand out from the rest. It has a Unique TWS function that enables users to connect to an additional speaker to make the sound Stereo. The workmanship of this speaker has twice the impact with multiple connectivity modes such as Bluetooth v4.2, FM & SD card slot. The body is constructed of durable materials, which offers all-around withstanding protection. Inbase Boom lite speakers are perfect for any indoor and outdoor activities.
Small But Packs a Punch
Boom Lite is small, compact and lightweight speaker as it weighs only 271 grams and comes with a powerful output of 3W x 1, promising a combination of high performance and unmatchable style.


* This Inbase Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
TWS Technology
Boom Lite speaker gives you the possibility to connect two speakers thanks to its True Wireless Connection (TWS) feature providing you a stereo sound experience.


* This Inbase Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Unmatched Range and Connectivity
The small party speaker comes equipped with Bluetooth V4.2 which provides a connectivity and wireless range of 10 metres making it an ideal companion to listen to your favourite songs while cooking your favourite dish in your kitchen.


* This Inbase Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Consume Less, Give More
The speaker has an in-built battery capacity of 500 mAh which has a charge time of 2 hours but gives out an unparalleled playback time of 4 hours in single charge, doubling your leisure listening time.


* This Inbase Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Play in Rain Too
Certified with IP68, the speaker is water resistant making it ideal for water related activities and yeah, you can enjoy sweet monsoon melodies


* This Inbase Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
More Connectivity
Apart from Bluetooth, you can also play your favourite tracks on Boom Lite through USB cable, TF card, FM, and Aux cable.


* This Inbase Boom Lite Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Bose SoundLink Flex Portable Bluetooth Speaker, IP67 Waterproof and Dustproof, Positioniq technology, Upto 12 hrs of playtime, Built-in microphone, Stereo pairing, Stone Blue
description:
ASTONISHING SOUND. 
WHEREVER LIFE TAKES YOU.
Music fuels and complements so many of life’s passions and you want to take yours with you—wherever you go. The SoundLink Flex Bluetooth speaker is the perfect musical sidekick, with a rugged design able to withstand water, dust and a few bumps and bruises along the way. Whether you’re hiking in the mountains or having friends over for dinner, the powerful SoundLink Flex will amaze you with lifelike performance and deep, rich tones that elevate any moment.


 
* This Bose speaker video is for illustration 
purpose only.
"Best mini Bluetooth speaker you can buy right now."
Rich sound to elevate your passions
You feel a strong, deep connection to the places you go. It makes sense that you’d want that same feeling for your music. This is where SoundLink Flex shines. The sound is crisp, clear and free of distortions, so you can hear each instrument and nuances in the vocals. The treble and bass are balanced, allowing you to hear every pitch. And its powerful bass can boom and project music that energises and makes you rock your head. It’s all made possible with innovative technology housed in a beautiful, versatile design.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
WATERPROOF AND DUSTPROOF (IP67)
Survives spills, dips and more.
Rigorously tested to meet an IP67 rating, SoundLink Flex is waterproof. Dunk it in water and it’ll keep on playing. It even floats, so it won’t sink to the ocean floor if it falls off of your paddleboard. The speaker is also protected against dust, so you don’t need to worry if it gets sandy at the beach. To ensure further protection from water, dust and debris, the transducer and passive radiators underneath the steel grille are built with rugged, waterproof materials and are sealed tightly to the speaker’s housing.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
RUGGED DESIGN
Built to handle some bruising
With its powder-coated steel grille and silicone exterior, the SoundLink Flex Bluetooth speaker was purpose-built with durable materials, making it adventure-ready. Its tough exterior can withstand almost any mishap, like a fall to the floor. The grille’s thick coat of powder gives the speaker a rugged texture that can withstand whatever your day throws at it. The powder coat won’t peel or flake, and it’s resistant to rust corrosion and UV light. Yet, for all that “tough talk”, the unique ergonomic design of this wireless speaker is easy to hold and feels good in your hand wherever you grab it.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
POSITIONIQ TECHNOLOGY
Tilt it. Flip it. Hang it. Always incredible sound.
SoundLink Flex is versatile enough to take with you anywhere. And with its PositionIQ technology, it automatically adjusts to however it’s oriented to optimise the sound. Whether it’s standing upright, lying on its back or hanging from its tear-resistant utility loop, the SoundLink Flex will deliver your music in full, balanced tones.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
UP TO 12 HOURS PER CHARGE
Keeps up with you all day
Whether you’re working a long shift or enjoying a day on the water, SoundLink Flex will provide your soundtrack all day. It can go for up to 12 hours on a single charge and when it’s time to power back up, you can recharge it quickly via its USB-C port.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PAIRS WITH OTHER BOSE SPEAKERS
Bose speakers, better together.
Sure, SoundLink Flex is incredible all on its own. But like all Bose speakers, this versatile portable speaker gets even better when teamed up with other speakers. Pair it with another SoundLink Flex or other Bose Bluetooth speaker to enable Party Mode and enjoy what you’re hearing in more rooms. Or more areas outdoors. Even a bit of both—SoundLink Flex also connects to Bose Smart Soundbars so you can keep tabs on the game while you’re away from the TV. 
Fuel your passion. Wherever you go.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Bose speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Compatible with the Bose Connect app
With the Bose Connect app, you can personalise your settings, pair multiple speakers, unlock product features, keep your software up to date and more.
Speakerphone
SoundLink Flex’s built-in microphone lets you take calls when connected to your phone via Bluetooth, while the speaker’s excellent sound means that you won’t miss a word.
Reliable Bluetooth pairing
Connect SoundLink Flex to your phone, tablet or laptop using Bluetooth from up to 9 metres away. It will remember up to eight recently connected devices.
How it all comes together
A product of state-of-the-art engineering, SoundLink Flex is packed with exclusive Bose technologies. Its innovative transducer is custom designed to deliver the clearest possible sound and strong, deep bass that really packs a punch. The speaker’s digital signal processing (DSP) technologies, proprietary code and custom algorithms all work together to ensure optimal sound quality wherever you are.

name: JBL Flip 6 by Harman Bluetooth Speaker with Upto 12 Hours Playtime, IP67 Waterproof & Dustproof with PartyBoost, 2-way speaker system, Deep Bass, Black
description:
Bold sound for every adventure
Your adventure. Your soundtrack. The bold JBL Flip 6 delivers powerful JBL Original Pro Sound with exceptional clarity thanks to its 2-way speaker system consisting of an optimized racetrack-shaped driver, separate tweeter, and dual pumping bass radiators. This big-sounding, yet easy to carry speaker is waterproof and dustproof, so you can take it anywhere in any weather. And with 12 hours of battery life, you can party 'til the sun goes down—or comes up—wherever the music moves you. Use PartyBoost to link multiple compatible speakers. The Flip 6 comes in a variety of cool colors.
Louder, more powerful sound
The beat goes on with the JBL Flip 6 2-way speaker system, engineered to deliver loud, crystal clear, powerful sound. Its racetrack-shaped woofer delivers exceptional low frequencies and midrange, while a separate tweeter produces crisp, clear high-frequencies. Flip 6 also features optimized dual passive radiators for deep bass, fine-tuned with using Harman's advanced algorithm.

* This JBL Flip 6 by Harman Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
IP67 waterproof and dustproof
To the pool. To the park. JBL Flip 6 is IP67 waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.

* This JBL Flip 6 by Harman Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
12 Hours of Playtime
Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. JBL Flip 6 gives you up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge.

* This JBL Flip 6 by Harman Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Bold design
Bold audio meets bold design. Big-sounding yet easy to carry, the design fits any personal style. Stand it vertical or horizontal and choose from a variety of vibrant colors.
Crank up the fun with PartyBoost
PartyBoost allows you to pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to truly pump up your party.
JBL Portable app
Maximize your audio experience with the JBL Portable app. Get updates and product support straight from your phone. Then unlock features, amplify your audio, or tweak your bass for total control over your sound.
USB charging protection
Power up with peace of mind. The JBL Flip 6 offers USB-C charging protection. That means a reminder sound will alert you to unplug if the connector detects water, salt, or any other chemicals.
Wireless Bluetooth streaming
Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns enjoying JBL Original Pro sound.
Eco-friendly packaging
JBL is committed to a more sustainable, earth-friendly packaging. The Flip 6 is packaged in a recyclable paper-based box, including the inner tray. The plastic hangtag is over 90% recycled and the exterior is printed with soy ink.

description:
Inbase Boom Lite speaker is ergonomically designed and engineered for greater clarity, sound and offers big beats on the go. Long-lasting battery and playtime up to 5 hours on a single charge make it stand out from the rest. It has a Unique TWS function that enables users to connect to an additional speaker to make the sound Stereo. The workmanship of this speaker has twice the impact with multiple connectivity modes such as Bluetooth v4.2, FM & SD card slot. The body is constructed of durable materials, which offers all-around withstanding protection. Inbase Boom lite speakers are perfect for any indoor and outdoor activities.
Small But Packs a Punch
Boom Lite is small, compact and lightweight speaker as it weighs only 271 grams and comes with a powerful output of 3W x 1, promising a combination of high performance and unmatchable style.

name: Inbase IB-1298 Boom Plus Bluetooth Speaker with HD Mic and Rugged and Water Resistant, Black
description:
The Inbase Boom Plus speaker is designed and engineered for greater clarity, sound, and accurate mids. The Higher Quality Crystal Clear Sound & Features distance it from the competition. Enjoy Crystal clear calls and rock-solid music with a specially designed Graphene Coated Driver. The Volume Booster 5+ watt power AMP pumps out more volume and plays your music with no distortion, even at maximum volume. With its unique TWS Function Amplify your listening experience to an epic level & rock the party by connecting with an additional Boom Pro Speaker. Durable Fabric with Rugged Design suitable for both Indoor and Outdoor activities. With long-lasting battery and playtime up to 4 hours on a single charge. Boom plus is a totally Splash proof, Rainproof speaker; with IPX68 certification the speaker can resist gentle water spray and splash but cannot be partially or fully submerged. Built with advanced components, it produces clean and precise audio, even at the highest levels. The powerful bass response from a compact design that's easy to take with you.
Consume Less, Give More
The speaker has an in-built battery capacity of 500 mAh which has a charge time of 2 hours but gives out an unparalleled playback time of 4 hours in single charge, doubling your leisure listening time.


* This Inbase Boom Plus Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
TWS Technology
Boom Plus speaker gives you the possibility to connect two speakers thanks to its True Wireless Connection (TWS) feature providing you a stereo sound experience.


* This Inbase Boom Plus Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Unmatched Range and Connectivity
The Boom Plus comes equipped with the latest version of Bluetooth V5.0 which provides a connectivity and wireless range of 10 metres making it an ideal companion to listen to your favourite songs while cooking your favourite dish in your kitchen.


* This Inbase Boom Plus Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Play in rain too
Certified with IP68, Boom Plus is water resistant making it ideal for pool parties and water related activities and yeah, you can enjoy sweet monsoon melodies too.


* This Inbase Boom Plus Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
More Connectivity
Apart from Bluetooth, you can also play your favourite tracks on Boom Plus through USB cable, TF card, FM, and Aux cable.

name: Inbase IB-1663 Boom Plus Bluetooth Speaker with HD Mic and Rugged and Water Resistant, Green
description:
The Inbase Boom Plus speaker is designed and engineered for greater clarity, sound, and accurate mids. The Higher Quality Crystal Clear Sound & Features distance it from the competition. Enjoy Crystal clear calls and rock-solid music with a specially designed Graphene Coated Driver. The Volume Booster 5+ watt power AMP pumps out more volume and plays your music with no distortion, even at maximum volume. With its unique TWS Function Amplify your listening experience to an epic level & rock the party by connecting with an additional Boom Pro Speaker. Durable Fabric with Rugged Design suitable for both Indoor and Outdoor activities. With long-lasting battery and playtime up to 4 hours on a single charge. Boom plus is a totally Splash proof, Rainproof speaker; with IPX68 certification the speaker can resist gentle water spray and splash but cannot be partially or fully submerged. Built with advanced components, it produces clean and precise audio, even at the highest levels. The powerful bass response from a compact design that's easy to take with you.
Consume Less, Give More
The speaker has an in-built battery capacity of 500 mAh which has a charge time of 2 hours but gives out an unparalleled playback time of 4 hours in single charge, doubling your leisure listening time.

TWS Technology
Boom Plus speaker gives you the possibility to connect two speakers thanks to its True Wireless Connection (TWS) feature providing you a stereo sound experience.

Unmatched Range and Connectivity
The Boom Plus comes equipped with the latest version of Bluetooth V5.0 which provides a connectivity and wireless range of 10 metres making it an ideal companion to listen to your favourite songs while cooking your favourite dish in your kitchen.

Play in rain too
Certified with IP68, Boom Plus is water resistant making it ideal for pool parties and water related activities and yeah, you can enjoy sweet monsoon melodies too.

More Connectivity

name: Marshall Action ll Wired and Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Built-in Amazon Alexa, Black
description:
* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Revolutionary Sound Now With Alexa
Acton II Voice is the smallest speaker in the Marshall line-up, but produces a sound that’s nothing short of large. It delivers a well-balanced, powerful audio experience that’s easily controlled by your voice.

* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Now you can play and control your music hands-free with Alexa. Use your voice to play music or listen to a podcast while you’re busy doing other things.

* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Customize Your Sound
Fine-tune your music to meet your requirements. Just use the Marshall Voice app or the analogue controls on your speaker’s top panel to perfect your sound according to the room you’re in.

* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Far-field Voice Recognition
Marshall Voice speakers use a far-field microphone array for smart voice recognition and noise cancellation. Even when the music is turned up or if you’re across the room, Alexa will hear you.Want some privacy? Turn Alexa off by pressing the voice mute button on your speaker’s top panel.

* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Build A Multi-room System With Amazon Alexa
Want to fill your home with music? With multi-room music on Alexa-enabled devices you can wirelessly play different songs in each room or bring it all together and play the same song throughout the entire home. You can chose from the larger Stanmore or if space is limited the Acton is the one for you.

* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Control Your Smart Home
Got a smart home? With Acton II Voice you can use Alexa to control Alexa-enabled interfaces such as TVs, lights, locks, thermostats and more.

* This Marshall Action ll Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: pTron Musicbot Evo Bluetooth Sound bar with 1200 mAh Battery, Black
description:
1) 10W Stereo Soundbar with 10Hrs Playback Time
2) Loud & Clear Stereo Sound with Punchy Bass
3) Portable & Lightweight Soundbar with Metal Grill
4) Bluetooth v5.0 with 10m Wireless Range
5) Large 1200mAh Rechargeable Battery
6) Memory Card Slot (micro SD card up to 32GB)
7) Play Music thru 3.5mm Aux & USB Drive
8) TWS Function to Double the Fun (pair 2 Musicbot Evo together)
Let the party begin! Powerful 10Watt of stereo sound with thumping bass. Portal & Lightweight Soundbar: Round edges and front metal honeycomb grill add up to the aesthetic and ergonomics. Loud & Clear Stereo Sound: pTron Musicbot Evo wireless soundbar is built with two 52mm all-magnetic speakers, which ensures that the speakers emit stunning sound quality with sufficient bass. Built-in Large Battery: This Bluetooth speaker is equipped with a large 1200mAh rechargeable battery to ensure a playback time of 10 hours on a single charge. Stereo Soundbar for TV & Computer:2x5W speakers to deliver clear and crystal sound. The soundbar speaker can enhance your listening experience when you enjoy indoor movies, videos, music, and games. Multiple Play Options: Want to save your phone's battery? No problem. This soundbar Bluetooth speaker has plug & play options - 3.5mm aux/USB drive/TF card. Wide Compatibility: Musicbot Evo can be used in either wireless or wired mode. In wireless Bluetooth mode, it can be paired to and used with any Bluetooth-enabled smartphone, tablet & PC. In wired mode, you may utilize the 3.5mm AUX cable included and wire-plug the speaker into any audio device that can output audio through a 3.5mm port

name: Sony SRS-XG300 Portable Bluetooth Speaker with 25 Hours Battery, Black
description:
Power and portability for your playlist:
With a built-in handle and heavy-duty sound, the XG300 makes it easy to start the party anywhere.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Robust IP67 Waterproof and dustproof design :
From the beach to the park to the pool, the XG300 stands up to the elements with one of the highest ratings for protection from water and dust.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Play all day on a single charge:
Keep the party going with up to 25 hours of battery life on a single charge, & USB-C quick charging gives you up to 70 minutes of playback after just 10 minutes of charge time. The Battery Care feature stops charging just before the battery reaches 100 percent to increase the health and life span

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
X-Balanced speakers:
Get extra power, clarity, and distortion-free sound with X-Balanced technology. Instead of the traditional circular design, our unique diaphragm shape increases sound pressure for booming bass and distinctive, high-quality audio.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
LED ring lighting that makes the mood:
Light up your environment. Whether it’s low-key ambient accents you want or lighting that syncs to the beat on the dancefloor, it’s all customizable through the Sony Music Center app.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Microphone w/ echo cancelling technology:
With Echo Cancelling technology, the XG300 allows for more natural conversations during online meetings by having two people talk at the same time without cutting either one off.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sony Music Center app:
Keep the energy going, cue the next song, or change out your playlist, all from the palm of your hand with the Sony Music Center app.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
USB Type-C and Device Charging:
The XG300 comes with a USB-C for battery charging, and doubles as a power bank with a USB-A port for charging another device no matter where you are.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Connect wirelessly :
Quick, effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices as well as Multipoint Connections that allows two devices to connect simultaneously.

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Party Connect:
Add to the fun with up to 100 compatible X-series speakers via Party Connect App

* This Sony SRS-XG300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Sony X-Series XE200 Portable Wireless Speaker with IP67 Water Resistant and Dustproof, Fast charging, upto 16 hrs of playtime, Hands free function, Bluetooth 5.2, Wider sound, Black
description:
Better sound all around
The XE200 has a Line-Shape Diffuser that will help your music reach further, even to the side of the speaker. Plus, with a portable size and handy carry strap, you can take it anywhere you go with ease.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Introducing the Line-Shape Diffuser
Inspired by the audio systems used at professional concerts, Sony's unique Line-Shape Diffuser creates line source and distributes the sound energy much more evenly across a wide sound front, to better fill your venue with audio. This spreads high quality sound further and wider around your venue, without the sound losing quality.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
What the Line-Shape Diffuser does
With the Line-Shape Diffuser, the sound spreads further to the front area of the speaker allowing you to enjoy the same sound quality whether you are at the front or to the side of the speaker. This means that everyone in your venue can dance to the same music feeling the same sound quality. A=Conventional Service Area B=Wider Service Area with Line-Shape Diffuser
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
How it works
Unlike a conventional speaker with most of the energy focused from the centre of the cone, our unique Line-Shape Diffuser refocuses the sound through a narrow aperture. The increase in sound pressure energy spreads the audio equally in each direction both further and wider out from the speaker.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
What is the X-Balanced Speaker Unit?
Unlike the circular diaphragm in a conventional speaker unit, the newly developed X-Balanced Speaker Unit in the XE200 features a non-circular diaphragm which realises more sound pressure for a high quality sound.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Increasing sound pressure and reducing distortion
The unit's non-circular shape not only maximises the area of the speaker diaphragm, increasing sound pressure for more punchy bass, it also reduces driver excursion while maintaining the same sound pressure, resulting in less distortion.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Greater clarity and a wider sound stage
In addition, the unit's off-centre design and optimised weight balance help to enhance clarity and widen the sound stage.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Dual passive radiators
Dual passive radiators reproduce powerful bass notes.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Charge up in a hurry
If you find yourself a little short of time, don't worry. Quick charging will give you 70 minutes of play on just a 10-minute charge.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Enjoy improved call quality with Echo Cancelling
Have better meetings and calls with Echo Cancelling. This allows two people to talk at the same time without cutting either of them off. Plus, you can mute in an instant with the convenient MIC Mute button, right on the speaker. With Multipoint Connection, two devices can be paired at the same time.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Get things booming with Party Connect and Stereo Pair
With Party Connect you can combine up to 100 compatible wireless speakers with BLUETOOTH technology and sync your music so everyone dances to the same beat. Or with Stereo Pair you can connect two speakers wirelessly for an epic stereo sound. Both features are activated in the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
USB Type-C port
Use a USB Type-C cable to charge the XE200.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Bluetooth connection and Fast Pair
In one tap, the Sony SRS-XE200 enables quick effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sustainability in mind
Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. Recycled plastic developed especially for Sony is used in internal parts of XE200. Also, the individual packaging for XE200 comprises of no more than 5 perecnt plastic materials. These reflect Sony's commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stand it up or on its side
With the recommended vertical layout, you can enjoy the full sound benefits of the Line-Shape Diffuser. And you can also lay it down, and enjoy the stereo audio playback using the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sony | Music Center
Optimise audio settings, select playlist, cue the next song and control Party Connect. Manage your devices right from your phone with the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Marshall Woburn III Bluetooth Speaker with Volume Control Knob, Black
description:
HOME-SHAKING SOUND
Woburn III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor and fills any space with immersive, home-shaking Marshall signature sound. Woburn III has been re-engineered with a new three-way driver system, which delivers more controlled, lower-frequency bass and greater clarity in the midrange.
This new generation of Woburn has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room. Dynamic Loudness adjusts the tonal balance of the sound to ensure your music sounds brilliant at every volume. When you connect with HDMI, Night Mode keeps the neighbours happy, reducing louder sounds while ensuring quiet sounds are still audible.
 
* This Marshall Woburn 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PAIR, PLAY AND TURN IT UP
Woburn III is straight to business, so you can just pair and play without the hassle of a complex set-up. You’ll find everything you need right there on the unit so you can easily control your music without ever picking up your device.
 
* This Marshall Woburn 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
NEXT-GENERATION BLUETOOTH
Woburn III is ready for the future of Bluetooth technology and has been built to deliver next-generation Bluetooth features the moment they are available. Over the Air (OTA) updates via the app ensure that your speaker is always up-to-date with the latest software and features. This future-proof technology will deliver higher audio quality, while increasing streaming range and improving audio sync.
 
* This Marshall Woburn 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC DESIGN THAT STANDS APART
Marshall has taken its signature rock ’n’ roll home speaker line-up and given it a stripped-back look that makes a loud statement. Its iconic design knocks all other speakers off the shelf. Signature details such as the Marshall script and brass control knobs adorn the speaker, echoing the legacy of rock ’n’ roll. Choose the finish that fits you – original Black or vintage Cream.
 
* This Marshall Woburn 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
A MORE SUSTAINABLE APPROACH
Woburn III has music at heart and the environment in mind. This new generation takes a more sustainable approach with a PVC-free build that comprises 70% recycled plastic and only vegan materials.
 
* This Marshall Woburn 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HDMI CONNECTIVITY
With so many ways to connect to Woburn III, getting the right sound for listening to music or watching TV has never been so effortless. Connect to your speaker directly from your device using Bluetooth, RCA or 3.5 mm. Woburn III also has an HDMI input, which allows you to connect Woburn III to your TV for a uniquely Marshall viewing experience.
 
* This Marshall Woburn 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Marshall Willen Bluetooth Speaker with 15 hour Playtime, Cream
description:
TAKE MARSHALL SOUND WITH YOU, EVERYWHERE
Willen is the mighty portable speaker that is made to go everywhere with you. Power your music with Marshall signature sound every single time, even when the session isn’t planned.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
DESIGN THAT SHAKES OFF THE ELEMENTS
Willen comes with a top-of-class IP67 dust- and water-resistance rating so it’s always ready for the road. This speaker brings together the iconic Marshall design with a ruggedness that dares you to push its limits.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PLAYTIME THAT WON’T LET YOU DOWN
Willen is ready to roll whenever you are with a hefty 15+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Whenever you need to top up its battery, 3 hours of charging will bring it back to full power.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
A SUSTAINABLE APPROACH TO MUSIC
Willen is just as impressive when you go backstage. This speaker’s rugged build is PVC-free and 60% of the plastic is post-consumer recycled from used electronics. Willen delivers on the promise of a more sustainable approach from Marshall while retaining the iconic design that embodies the brand’s heritage.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ATTACH WILLEN ANYWHERE WITH THE STRAP
Willen is the ultimate multi-purpose speaker with its flexible positioning. Stand it up, lay it down, fix it to an object or let it hang out with its rubber back-mounted strap.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
BUILT-IN MICROPHONE
Make sure your voice is heard with Willen’s built-in microphone. Answer and reject calls using the front-mounted control knob and enjoy some hands-free chat.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PAIR, PLAY AND BRING THE LOUD
The shortest distance between you and your music is Willen – just pair and play without any complicated set-up. If you want to adjust your sound, you can choose between three equaliser presets in the app.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CONNECT MORE SPEAKERS WITH STACK MODE
Stack Mode raises the stakes with a sound larger than Willen. Amplify your sound with a multi-speaker session by connecting your speaker to other Willen speakers. Create a sound as big as your imagination.
 
* This Marshall WILLEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description:
ROOM-FILLING SOUND
Acton III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, delivering room-filling Marshall signature sound that has been re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation of Acton has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room. Acton III also features Dynamic Loudness, which adjusts the tonal balance of the sound to ensure your music sounds brilliant at every volume.
 
* This Marshall Action 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PAIR, PLAY AND TURN IT UP
Acton III is straight to business, so you can just pair and play without the hassle of a complex set-up. You’ll find everything you need right there on the unit so you can easily control your music without ever picking up your device.
 
* This Marshall Action 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
NEXT-GENERATION BLUETOOTH
Acton III is ready for the future of Bluetooth technology and has been built to deliver next-generation Bluetooth features the moment they are available. Over the Air (OTA) updates via the app ensure that your speaker is always up-to-date with the latest software and features. This future-proof technology will deliver higher audio quality, while increasing streaming range and improving audio sync.

Choose the finish that fits you – original Black, vintage Cream or relaxed Brown.

A MORE SUSTAINABLE APPROACH

name: Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Smart Bluetooth Speaker with Alexa, Black
description:
Introducing Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen 2021 release)
Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) is an upgrade of our best-selling smart speaker with screen and has an 8-inch display that customers love, an improved 13 MP camera with auto framing feature, stereo sound and Alexa. Just ask Alexa to watch movies and TV Shows on Amazon Prime Video and Netflix, make video calls to other Alexa contacts, listen to music, control smart home devices, and much more. You can also use Echo Show 8’s camera to monitor your home remotely on your Alexa app or on other Echo Show devices. Alexa speaks English & Hindi.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Packed with entertainment
Echo Show 8 is your personal entertainment corner: Watch latest TV shows & movies from Amazon Prime Video and Netflix or enjoy latest movie trailers from IMDB or simply catch up on news. Stream millions of songs in your favourite language from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, Spotify, JioSaavn, and Gaana. Enjoy singing along with on screen lyrics from Amazon Prime Music. Kids can safely enjoy skills like Chu Chu TV, Chhota Bheem, Animal Sounds and more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Look in when you are out
Securely access the built-in camera to remotely monitor the room on your Alexa app or on other Echo Show devices- it's peace of mind wherever and whenever you want.



* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
Voice control your smart home
Setup and manage compatible smart home devices with your voice or through the simple interactive display. Just ask Alexa to control smart lights, view security cameras, and create routines to schedule daily tasks like switching on the geyser or AC using smart plugs.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stay in frame during video calls
Make hands-free video calls to your friends and family without worrying about keeping yourself in frame. The improved 13 MP camera can pan and zoom to make sure you and your family are front and centre. You can make video calls to anyone having the Alexa app or other Echo Show devices.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Your perfect companion
Echo Show 8 is your perfect companion to catch up on latest news, to cook along with Sanjeev Kapoor recipes or to play nursery rhymes for your kids. You can also ask Alexa to set timers, reminders, get weather updates and much more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Shop with Alexa
Alexa makes it easy and convenient for you to shop on Amazon. Build your shopping list with Alexa, get products information and prices, check out latest deals, reorder your past purchases, add items to your cart, check status of your orders, get delivery notifications and more. Alexa is always ready to help you save time and money for your shopping needs.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa has skills
Skills are like apps that add capabilities to your Echo device. You can listen to All India Radio, enjoy kids’ edutainment and games, stay updated with the latest news or learn something new with wikiHow. Just say “Alexa, help me get started with skills.“

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
More ways to control your privacy
Alexa and Echo devices are built with multiple layers of privacy. For example, your voice is streamed to the cloud only after your device detects the wake word “Alexa”. You can also turn the microphone off with the press of a button. And the built in cover lets you easily close the camera.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to setup

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen) Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Razer Nommo 2.0 Gaming Speaker with Rear-Facing Bass Ports, Black
description:
* This Razer Nommo 2.0 Channel Gaming Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
FULL RANGE IMMERSION
Powerful audio can completely immerse you in your experience, bringing games, movies and music to life. With optimized drivers built for full range sound and extreme clarity, the Razer Nommo takes you to a new dimension that blurs the line between fiction and reality.
 
* This Razer Nommo 2.0 Channel Gaming Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CUSTOM WOVEN GLASS FIBER 3-INCH DRIVERS
Our custom woven glass fiber 3-inch drivers are engineered to deliver ultra-clear sound with uncanny sharpness. By incorporating custom glass fiber into the speaker cones, it affects the vibrations and produces a tighter sound with higher frequencies, allowing you to hear distinct layers and audio details.
 
* This Razer Nommo 2.0 Channel Gaming Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
REAR-FACING BASS PORTS
Hidden behind the speaker bodies are rear-facing bass ports, each engineered to deliver increased bass output for a fuller, richer range of audio. The bass ports sit inside massive chambers, amplifying the low end to shake your core whether it’s a gunshot, right hook or EDM track.
 
* This Razer Nommo 2.0 Channel Gaming Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
BASS KNOB WITH AUTOMATIC GAIN CONTROL
On the right speaker sits a bass control knob, allowing you to fine-tune the output perfectly—from ground-shaking bass to a low hum for late night sessions. Thanks to automatic gain control, you can also ensure the bass scales distortion-free.
Chroma lighting is available for Razer Nommo Chroma and Razer Nommo Pro only.
 
* This Razer Nommo 2.0 Channel Gaming Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
POWERED BY RAZER CHROMA
Choose from 16.8 million colors and pre-set lighting effects to personalize your listening experience, or take immersive gameplay up a notch with ambient lighting that reacts to your every move.
 
* This Razer Nommo 2.0 Channel Gaming Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Sony X-Series XE200 Portable Wireless Speaker with IP67 Water Resistant and Dustproof, Fast charging, upto 16 hrs of playtime, Hands free function, Bluetooth 5.2, Wider sound, Blue
description:
Better sound all around
The XE200 has a Line-Shape Diffuser that will help your music reach further, even to the side of the speaker. Plus, with a portable size and handy carry strap, you can take it anywhere you go with ease.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Introducing the Line-Shape Diffuser
Inspired by the audio systems used at professional concerts, Sony's unique Line-Shape Diffuser creates line source and distributes the sound energy much more evenly across a wide sound front, to better fill your venue with audio. This spreads high quality sound further and wider around your venue, without the sound losing quality.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
What the Line-Shape Diffuser does
With the Line-Shape Diffuser, the sound spreads further to the front area of the speaker allowing you to enjoy the same sound quality whether you are at the front or to the side of the speaker. This means that everyone in your venue can dance to the same music feeling the same sound quality. A=Conventional Service Area B=Wider Service Area with Line-Shape Diffuser
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
How it works
Unlike a conventional speaker with most of the energy focused from the centre of the cone, our unique Line-Shape Diffuser refocuses the sound through a narrow aperture. The increase in sound pressure energy spreads the audio equally in each direction both further and wider out from the speaker.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
What is the X-Balanced Speaker Unit?
Unlike the circular diaphragm in a conventional speaker unit, the newly developed X-Balanced Speaker Unit in the XE200 features a non-circular diaphragm which realises more sound pressure for a high quality sound.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Increasing sound pressure and reducing distortion
The unit's non-circular shape not only maximises the area of the speaker diaphragm, increasing sound pressure for more punchy bass, it also reduces driver excursion while maintaining the same sound pressure, resulting in less distortion.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Greater clarity and a wider sound stage
In addition, the unit's off-centre design and optimised weight balance help to enhance clarity and widen the sound stage.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Dual passive radiators
Dual passive radiators reproduce powerful bass notes.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Charge up in a hurry
If you find yourself a little short of time, don't worry. Quick charging will give you 70 minutes of play on just a 10-minute charge.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Enjoy improved call quality with Echo Cancelling
Have better meetings and calls with Echo Cancelling. This allows two people to talk at the same time without cutting either of them off. Plus, you can mute in an instant with the convenient MIC Mute button, right on the speaker. With Multipoint Connection, two devices can be paired at the same time.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Get things booming with Party Connect and Stereo Pair
With Party Connect you can combine up to 100 compatible wireless speakers with BLUETOOTH technology and sync your music so everyone dances to the same beat. Or with Stereo Pair you can connect two speakers wirelessly for an epic stereo sound. Both features are activated in the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
USB Type-C port
Use a USB Type-C cable to charge the XE200.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Bluetooth connection and Fast Pair
In one tap, the Sony SRS-XE200 enables quick effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sustainability in mind
Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. Recycled plastic developed especially for Sony is used in internal parts of XE200. Also, the individual packaging for XE200 comprises of no more than 5 perecnt plastic materials. These reflect Sony's commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stand it up or on its side
With the recommended vertical layout, you can enjoy the full sound benefits of the Line-Shape Diffuser. And you can also lay it down, and enjoy the stereo audio playback using the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sony | Music Center
Optimise audio settings, select playlist, cue the next song and control Party Connect. Manage your devices right from your phone with the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Have better meetings and calls with Echo Cancelling. This allows two people to talk at the same time without cutting either of them off. Plus, you can mute in an instant with the convenient MIC Mute button, right on the speaker. With Multipoint Connection, two devices can be paired at the same time.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Get things booming with Party Connect and Stereo Pair
With Party Connect you can combine up to 100 compatible wireless speakers with BLUETOOTH technology and sync your music so everyone dances to the same beat. Or with Stereo Pair you can connect two speakers wirelessly for an epic stereo sound. Both features are activated in the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
USB Type-C port
Use a USB Type-C cable to charge the XE200.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Bluetooth connection and Fast Pair
In one tap, the Sony SRS-XE200 enables quick effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sustainability in mind
Our products are not only designed to be stylish but also with the environment in mind. Recycled plastic developed especially for Sony is used in internal parts of XE200. Also, the individual packaging for XE200 comprises of no more than 5 perecnt plastic materials. These reflect Sony's commitment to reducing the environmental impact of our products and practices.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stand it up or on its side
With the recommended vertical layout, you can enjoy the full sound benefits of the Line-Shape Diffuser. And you can also lay it down, and enjoy the stereo audio playback using the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sony | Music Center
Optimise audio settings, select playlist, cue the next song and control Party Connect. Manage your devices right from your phone with the Sony | Music Center app.
 
* This Sony SRS-XE200 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Lenovo Smart Clock 2 Smart Speaker with Wireless Charging Dock, White, CD-24502F
description:
A daily assistant on your nightstand
Let your Lenovo Smart Clock 2 organize your day with reminders and alarms. Ask questions, check on traffic and weather, listen to news briefings, and more - all from the comfort of your bedroom. Just ask Google. Control up to 50,000 compatible devices with your voice or touch. And because you can toggle the mute button and the clock doesn't have a camera, your privacy is assured.

* This Lenovo Smart clock 2 image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Louder, crisper sounds
With improved front-firing speakers, the Smart Clock 2 delivers better, room-filling audio compared to its predecessor. The speakers are expertly tuned for clearer vocals. And you can broadcast to other speakers or smart devices across your home.

* This Lenovo Smart clock 2 image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Easily see what you need
With its 10.16 cm (4 inch) color touch screen, the Smart Clock 2 showcases the time, weather, and your family photos with a choice of customizable clock faces. With its soft-touch fabric cover in three great colors, it blends perfectly with any decor.

* This Lenovo Smart clock 2 image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Kickstart your day, unwind in the evening
Start your day better and keep on top of your tasks and schedule. Ask Google to check your next meeting time or play some music while you prepare for the day. Do more with a single command with the "good night" routine: turn off the lights, lock the doors, and play some relaxing white noise or music for a guided meditation before you go to sleep.

* This Lenovo Smart clock 2 image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Charge your other devices
Dock your Smart Clock 2 and let its wireless charging dock deliver a fast charge to your phone while you sleep. Keep your nighstand clutter-free. If you have a second device, use the dock's USB-A port to charge it simultaneously.

* This Lenovo Smart clock 2 image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Just the right amount of light
Your Smart Clock 2 is enhanced with a built-in nightlight when docked. The light is just bright enough to illuminate your way without bothering anyone else.

* This Lenovo Smart clock 2 image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
