name: Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Wireless Speaker with 30+ hour playtime, IP65 Rated Design (Black and Brass)
description:
* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
SUPERIOR SIGNATURE SOUND
Emberton II delivers sound that is rich, clear and loud, like the artist intended. Experience absolute 360 degree sound with True Stereophonic, a unique form of multi-directional sound from Marshall – where every spot is a sweet spot. By separating out the spatial content of stereo recordings, Emberton II produces a sound much larger than its size and outperforms most speakers in its class.

* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
30+ HOURS OF PORTABLE PLAYTIME
Emberton II offers 30+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Its compact size, rugged durability and reliable playtime make it perfect to take with you. When you’re out of battery, Emberton II won’t keep you waiting long – plug in your speaker and return to full battery in 3 hours.

* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ROADWORTHY IP67-RATED DESIGN
Emberton II is tough and resilient, boasting an extremely durable and easy-to-use design that features an IP67 dust- and water-resistance rating. It won’t let rain or dirt get in the way of your music.

* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PAIR, PLAY AND BRING THE LOUD
Emberton II won’t slow you down with a lengthy set-up–pair, play and let the good times roll. Download the dedicated app if you want to find the right sound with equaliser presets, and to keep your speaker up to date with Over-the-Air (OTA) updates.


* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HOST A MULTI-SPEAKER SESSION WITH STACK MODE
Emberton II has been powered up with Stack Mode. Amplify your sound with a multi-speaker session by connecting your speaker to other Emberton II speakers. Create a sound as big as your imagination.

* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
A MORE SUSTAINABLE APPROACH
Emberton II is faithful to the iconic heritage design of the brand while taking a more sustainable approach. This speaker’s sturdy build comprises 50 percent post-consumer recycled plastic from used electronics, water bottles and automotive light covers, and is 100 percent PVC-free.

* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC MARSHALL DESIGN
Emberton II combines contemporary technology with iconic Marshall design to deliver hard-hitting sound while retaining a classic look. You’ll want to proudly display this speaker anywhere you go.

* This Marshall EMBERTON 2 Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
BLUETOOTH 5.1
Emberton II comes equipped with Bluetooth 5.1 technology for simple connectivity, exceptional audio quality and wireless music play.

description:
Surround yourself with sound
 
* This Sony SRS-XE300 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Play all day on a single charge

name: Saregama Carvaan Premium Hindi - Portable Music Player with 5000 Preloaded Songs, FM/BT/AUX, Up to 5 hrs playtime,With an Interactive App (Royal Blue)
description:
Retro is back with the launch of Saregama Carvaan. This portable digital 

audio player comes with 5000 evergreen Hindi songs sorted 

inside.

The pre-loaded songs are categorized into stations based on lyricists, 

actors, singers, music composers, specials. Each music station can be 

selected by turning a jog-dial. So literally, with the turn of a knob, you can 

switch from Kishore Kumar classics, to R.D Burman’s pulsating hits, to 

songs picturised on the Angry young man - Amitabh Bachchan and other 

legends of Hindi Cinema. Carvaan also offers an array of specially curated 

stations like Romance, Sad, Gurbani, Mangeskars, Kapoors, Ghazal, Bhakti 

and many more. The Carvaan also houses the entire Ameen Sayani's 

Geetmala countdown collection spanning 50 years.

With the option to tune into FM/AM, Carvaan doubles up as your home 

radio too. You can also enjoy your personal collection of songs by plugging 

in a USB drive. Alternatively, you can connect your phone or tablet to 

Carvaan using Bluetooth or an AUX IN cable. Carvaan works on a 

rechargeable battery that lasts for approximately 5 hours. The product is 

backed by an all India service network, providing 1-year doorstep warranty 

support.

With its premium retro look, extensive content library, ease-of-use and 

warranty, Saregama Carvaan becomes the perfect gift for you and your 

loved ones.

name: All-new Amazon Echo Plus (2nd Gen) - Premium Sound with a Built-in Smart Home Hub, Grey
description:
Premium speaker powered by Dolby for 360° audio with crisp vocals and dynamic bass response.
Comes with a built-in hub to easily setup and control your compatible smart home devices from Philips Hue and Anchor - Just ask “Alexa, discover my devices”. Also voice control other smart lights or your existing AC, geyser, water pump, air purifier using smart plug (smart home accessories sold separately).
Just ask Alexa for music, news, trivias, scores, weather, alarms , kids rhymes and stories.
Alexa is always ready to help in both English and Hindi
Stream millions of songs from Amazon Prime Music, Spotify, JioSaavn, Gaana, Apple music.
Access songs in Hindi, English, Telugu, Tamil, Punjabi, Marathi, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Kannada and more.
With 4 microphones, Alexa can hear you across the room
What is Echo Plus?
Echo Plus features a premium speaker for powerful 360° sound, and a built-in smart home hub and temperature sensor. Just ask Alexa to play music, answer questions, make calls and get information, news, sports scores, weather, and more. With the built-in hub, starting your smart home is easier than ever.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to set up

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Meet Alexa, the brain behind Echo
Alexa, the brain behind Echo Plus, is built in the cloud, so it is always getting smarter. The more you use Echo Plus, the more Alexa adapts to your speech patterns and vocabulary. Using Alexa is simple – just ask and Alexa will respond instantly.
Make everyday easier
Make your life easier at home. Use your voice to set timers, add items to lists, and create calendar events and reminders. You can also check the news, weather, or traffic. Ask for sports scores, movie showtimes, restaurant hours, or information.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple way to start your smart home
Some smart home devices require an extra hub or registration for setup. With Echo Plus, you can plug in compatible Zigbee smart home devices and ask “Alexa, discover my devices.” After automatically detecting and setting up the devices, you’ll be able to control lights and plugs.
With “Routines”, you control your devices at scheduled times or with a single voice command, like turning off the lights when you go to bed or switch on the geyser every morning at 7 am. Find all compatible Alexa smart home devices and learn about devices that are easy to setup.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your music
Echo Plus has a new premium speaker design with Dolby processing, engineered for high quality audio. Use your voice to ask for any song, artist, or genre, and stream music from Amazon Prime Music, JioSaavn, Gaana, Hungama music and Spotify.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Can hear you across the room
Echo Plus has an array of seven microphones that use beam-forming technology and enhanced noise cancellation. This allows Echo Plus to hear you from across the room, even in noisy environments, or while playing music. When you want to use Echo Plus, simply say the wake word “Alexa” and it responds instantly.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa has skills
Alexa has more than 30,000+ skills and counting. Skills add capabilities to your Echo device. Skills can help you stay updated with the latest news, request a ride from Ola, listen to All India Radio and more. Create your own personal skills and custom responses with Alexa Skills Blueprints. Just say “Alexa, help me get started with skills.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stock up with Alexa
When you are running low on household essentials, Alexa makes it easy to refill your fridge or replenish your pantry. You can add everything from dry-fruits to AA batteries to your Amazon Cart, reorder favorite products from Amazon, and ask Alexa the status of your recent Amazon orders.

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Technical Details

* This Amazon B07CTTL5GR Computer Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description:
Carrying on the tradition of the inMotion brand, the Mini InMotion offers studio quality music 

performance in a compact and flexible design for use anywhere throughout the house. With the ability to 

be used in the horizontal and vertical orientations the Mini inMotion is the perfect Bluetooth speaker 

for environments where desktop and counter top space is limited. The iMW556N is loaded with four 1.5" 

Neodymium drivers for great audio performance plus an onboard microphone for clear hands free 

communication, voice confirmation, Aux In jack and up to 8 hours of battery life.

name: Altec Lansing Orbit Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Black
description:
Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
Small and lightweight, the Altec Lansing Bluetooth Orbit Speaker provides rich, high quality sound. It connects wirelessly to Apple, Android and BlackBerry devices, along with tablets and laptops. A built-in Aux jack makes this speaker compatible with any device with a 
headphone jack. The rugged rubberized skin protects it from damage, and you can enjoy up to five hours of music without having to recharge.
Portable Design
The Bluetooth Orbit is light enough to carry with you anywhere. A convenient carabiner clip will let you attach it to any bag, backpack, or even a belt loop. Control the volume from your device or the speaker. With up to five hours of battery life, you never have to worry 
about being near an outlet. It will even continue playing music while you text, email, or surf the web.
Bluetooth
Pairing your device to the Bluetooth speaker is easy. Choose the "iMW355" from your device, and it is memorized into the unit, ready to go at any time. With Vocal Confirmation, you'll 
always know the status of your connection. The Bluetooth speaker will store up to eight different sources in its memory.
Speakerphone

The Bluetooth Orbit's built-in microphone lets you enjoy hands-free calls and video chats. In the office or the park, conversations will be crisp and clear. The DSP Audio Enhancement technology provides optimum sound quality.
The Bluetooth Orbit at a Glance
Go up to 5 hours on one charge
Built-in Aux jack to use with any device
Hands free speakerphone lets you hear and be heard loud and clear
Carabiner clip allows you to clip your tunes and go
Simple setup with effortless Bluetooth pairing with vocal confirmation
Playback offers pure sound that brings out the best in your music
Carrying pouch included.
Outstanding Quality 
The Bluetooth Orbit looks and feels as great as it sounds. With its high quality construction and industrial strength molded casing, it is more than just a pretty package. Altec Lansing has created a sturdy and well-crafted device that is built to last.

name: Zoook ZB-Rocker Torpedo Portable Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Grey/ Yellow
description:
Another Great addition to the world famous Rocker Series - ZOOOK ROCKER TORPEDO first ever 50W bluetooth speaker with Masculine build and rugged body.

Barriers are meant to be broken, your Bluetooth speaker isn't. Introducing ROCKER TORPEDO - the best rugged Bluetooth speaker available. Crafted from fiber- reinforced resin and solid aluminum, ROCKER TORPEDO is ready for anything. Plus, with 8 hours of battery life, these beast-degree speakers have no limits. And neither will you.

Designed and inspired by the love shown by you, the ROCKER TORPEDO is exactly what its name says, A Torpedo of Music. Boasting IPX5 rating the ROCKER TORPEDO is truly a torpedo of high fidelity music! Redefining portability and durability, the ROCKER TORPEDO is an outdoor water resistant Bluetooth speaker. Its large sized drivers and a huge bass diaphragm punches the music out like never before. Don't be fooled by the ruggedness of the TORPEDO, it is also very elegant and pleasing to look at! Packing massive 25W x 2 speakers, the TORPEDO will literally have you asking for an encore! Optimized drivers to blast out deep and thumping bass whilst harmonizing with beautiful high's and low's. Get the beauty and the beast in one device, the ROCKER TORPEDO.
Experience Bass Like Never Before
Unlike ordinary Bluetooth speaker, the monster ZOOOK ROCKER TORPEDO Bluetooth Speaker amplifies higher as well as lower bass frequencies thanks to the unique combo of powerful stereo sound (50W) and a passive subwoofer! A power-packed bass experience on the go is finally here.
Extended Battery Life
8-hr Battery life to keep the beats going. Ordinary Bluetooth speakers just can't handle the heavy load of bass & stereo for long hours.
Waterproof & Shock-Absorbing Design
(IPX5 certified), The Rocker Torpedo Bluetooth Speaker can rock a party outdoors and indoors, beaches, poolside bashes or impromptu house parties, this rough-and-tough, rugged speaker is all you need to set the ball rolling!
Talk while you rock
The superior v4.1 Bluetooth connectivity enables easy hands-free communication to take and make calls.
Bigger, Stronger & Better
50 Watts of Power unlike ordinary Bluetooth speakers, the monster ROCKER TORPEDO Bluetooth speaker amplifies higher as well as lower bass frequencies, thanks to the unique combo of powerful stereo sound (50W) & a passive subwoofer.
Bluetooth 4.1
Uses the very latest Bluetooth technology to experience the high quality sound of Bluetooth A2DP with less delay, more stability, faster pairing, and lower power consumption from connected devices (like your phone) when wirelessly streaming audio.
Fabulous Looks Mighty Performance
Carry your music with you anywhere you go. Beaches, Gyms, Pool, Parties, long drives, outdoors or at home. Dazzling build quality complements the modern, minimalist rubberized finish on the body of these best in-class Bluetooth speakers.

name: Zoook ZB-Rocker Chrome Portable Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker
description:
Flaunt it in style, this elegant beauty is not only gorgeous, it sounds so amazing that it will hypnotize you with the charm of its amazingly balance sound. Taking ahead the world famous Zoook Rocker series with the beast in its -class, Zoook Rocker Chrome is by far the best speaker in its class and we assure you that you will love it a lot and we will be happily accepting the return in case you don't like it.
Solid Build
Exquisite aluminum alloy design and premium metal casing, stylish, slim and compact. Perfect size to put into your pocket or bag as a portable speaker.
Extremely Loud
Amazing sound quality from the pocket dynamo, the Rocker Chrome brings you the most beautiful Music ever with mega bass, making you feel like in the ocean of music with its 5W output.
Live-free with Hands-free
The noise cancelling microphone supports hands-free calling which not only frees your hands but also relieves you from inconvenience.
TF Card player
It supports TF card MP3 playback, now nothing can hold you back from your rocker experience.
Long play time
The 1800 mAh built-in lithium ion battery ensures upto 6 hrs. of Music playback, 30 hrs. of conversation, 200 hrs. of standby, which definitely guarantees your needs when you are partying indoors or outdoors or on the go.
Universal connectivity
It is compatible with Android, Iphone, ipad, tablets, smartphones, ipods, MP3, MP4 and other bluetooth enabled digital players.

name: Altec Lansing Life Jacket 2 IMW577 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Black
description: Feature rich and compact in design the Altec Lansing Life Jacket 2 IMW577 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker lets you experience unbeatable music quality, easy-to-use functions and unmatched style. With IP67 waterproof, shockproof, snowproof, everything-proof rating; floatable and submersible design, this speaker provides a 30-foot range along with extra audio horsepower, 16 hours on-board power bank for remotely charging portable devices and an 3.5mm aux-in port. Moreover, it comes with built-in universal mounting mechanism for easy attachment to bikes, kayaks, jet skis and motorcycles.

name: Blaupunkt BT-51 Multimedia Speaker, Black
description:
Enhance your music listening experience with the Blaupunkt BT-51 Multimedia Speaker. This wireless speaker offers quality sound and can also stream music over a Bluetooth connection. Furthermore, this speaker is lightweight and can be carried around with ease.
Amazing Power Output
Experience great music with this 8 W speaker. It’s RMS output lets you play music with an excellent sound quality.
Multiple Connectivity
Connect to any Bluetooth-enabled device to play music. As long as the device is within 10 m of the Blaupunkt BT-51 speaker, it will play music seamlessly.
Great Look, Greater Performance
Its compact design makes this portable Bluetooth speaker easy to carry in your bag. Despite being compact, it delivers a powerful performance.
Say Bye to Boundaries
Add some life to boring outdoor parties with this durable speaker. Its 1500 mAh battery lets you play music for over 10 hours.

name: Amazon Echo Show 5 Voice Activated Speaker with Screen, White
description:
Introducing Echo Show 5
Echo Show 5 connects to Alexa to give you rich visuals on a 13.9 cm (5.5 inch) screen with a crisp, full sound - in a design that fits in any room in your home. Ask Alexa to play your favourite music while cooking or play news while having breakfast. Alexa can remind you of important tasks like bill payments, kids’ classes and more. With a built-in camera ask Alexa to make video calls to friends & family or monitor your kid’s room while doing your daily chores, with compatible smart cameras.

name: Philips BT2505A/94 Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker, Blue
description:
Built-in rechargeable battery for music playback anywhere
Play music out loud - anytime, anywhere. The built-in rechargeable battery lets you enjoy your personal music without the fuss of entangled power cords and the inconvenient search for an electrical outlet. Enjoy great music with the freedom of portability now.
 * This PHILIPS BT 2505A94 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Enjoy music from multiple sources
 * This PHILIPS BT 2505A94 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Audio-in for easy connection to almost any electronic device
 * This PHILIPS BT 2505A94 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls
With its built-in microphone, this speaker also works as a speaker phone. When a call comes in, the music is put on pause and you can talk via the speaker. Call for a business meeting. Or, call your friend from a party. Either way, it works great.
Easy playback from MicroSD Card
Simply load the card with the desired content, plug it into your player- and never have to worry about running out of entertainment choices again.
Wireless music streaming via Bluetooth
Listen to all your favorite songs on a speaker that delivers fabulous sound. This Philips docking speaker plays music from your Android powered devices via Bluetooth. Simply download the free Philips DockStudio app and the Bluetooth will automatically be turned on and connect once when your device is docked. You get to enjoy powerful and outstanding sound, with unbeatable convenience. Hardly anything else sounds as good.
Carry it anywhere with the by-packed finely knitted strip
In line with the Philips CitiScape Strada's headband series, which was inspired by fashion sneakers and their vividly colored shoelaces, our by-packed strip is made of a vibrant and finely knitted fabric sleeve making it stylish enough to be a fashion accessory.
Built-in Digital FM radio
Digital Radio is, on top of FM analog transmission, a new way of broadcasting radio via a network of terrestrial transmitters. It provides listeners with more choices and information delivered in clear, crackle-free sound quality. The technology allows the receiver to lock on to the strongest signal it can be find. With digital stations there are no frequencies to remember, and sets are tuned by station name, so there is no returning on the move.

name: Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Voice Activated Speaker, White
description:
The Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker, White connects to Alexa to provide you rich visuals on a 20.32cm (8 inch) HD screen with a stereo sound, in a design that easily fits in any room in your house. You can ask Alexa to play your favourite numbers while cooking or play latest news while having breakfast at the table. You can watch the latest music videos, news, movie trailers, and sports updates on the Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker, White. You can make hands-free video calls to smartphones with the help of Alexa app and Skype. You can also make voice calls, send messages, or instantly connect to other Echo devices in your home to make a quick announcement or check in on the kids.


FROM THE MANUFACTURER

Introducing Echo Show 8
Echo Show 8 connects to Alexa to give you vivid visuals on a 8” HD screen with rich stereo sound - in a design that fits in any room in your home. Just ask Alexa to show your favourite TV shows, watch movies, play music with lyrics, show you weather updates, watch news bulletins, or control your smart home. It comes with a built-in camera, so just ask Alexa to make video calls to friends & family or monitor your kid’s room while doing your  
daily chores.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Enhanced Entertainment
Enjoy premium HD video with stereo sound as you watch the latest movies & award winning TV shows from Amazon Prime Video. Watch your favourite TV shows on Voot or music videos on Hungama Music. Enjoy  
stereo sound experience while streaming music from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, JioSaavn, Gaana, Hungama & more.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa Is Happy To Help
Make your life easier at home. Use your voice to cook along with step by step recipes, set timers, add items to lists, and create calendar events and reminders. You can also check the news, weather, or traffic. Ask for sports scores, movie showtimes, restaurant hours, or information.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Hands-Free Video Calling And Messaging
Echo Show 8 makes it easy to stay in touch. Make video calls to friends and family who have Skype, other Echo devices with screen, or the Alexa app. You can also make voice calls, send messages, or instantly connect to other  
Echo devices in your home to make a quick announcement or check in on the kids.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice Control Your Entertainment
Sing along to the lyrics of your favourite songs. Discover and enjoy music and videos as you stream directly from Amazon Prime Music, Apple Music, JioSaavn, Gaana or Hungama Music.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice Control Your Smart Home
Enjoy hands-free control of your compatible smart home devices. Just ask Alexa to control smart lights, view security cameras, and create routines to let Alexa manage daily tasks like switching on the geyser or AC using smart  
plugs. You can also manage your smart home devices via the simple interactive display on the screen.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
More Ways To Control Your Privacy
Alexa and Echo devices are built with multiple layers of privacy protection. From the mic/camera off button and built-in shutter to the ability to delete your voice recordings, you have transparency and control over your Alexa  
experience.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa Has Skills
Skills are like apps that add capabilities to your Echo device. You can listen to All India Radio, enjoy kids’ edutainment and games, stay updated with the latest news or learn something new with wikiHow. Just say “Alexa, help  
me get started with skills.

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple To Set Up

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Technical Details

* This Amazon Echo Show 8 Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) - New and Improved Smart Speaker with Alexa, Purple
description:
The fantastic Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) Smart Speaker, Purple is a hands-free smart speaker that you can use to control other devices using your voice. Echo Dot can hear you from across the room, even in noisy environments. You can use the Amazon Echo Dot (3rd Gen) Smart Speaker, Purple to control with compatible hundreds of smart home devices from Philips, Wipro, Syska, TP-Link. You can either use the crisp and clear built-in speaker or connect Echo Dot to your own other speakers using Bluetooth or 3.5mm audio cable.
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
What is Echo Dot?




* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.

With a new speaker and design, Echo Dot is a voice-controlled smart speaker with Alexa, designed for any room. Just ask for music, news, information, control compatible smart home devices and more. You can either use the crisp and clear built-in speaker or connect Echo Dot to your own other speakers using Bluetooth or 3.5mm audio cable.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Simple to set up


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Meet Alexa, the brain behind Echo
Alexa, the brain behind Echo Dot, is built in the cloud, so it is always getting smarter. The more you use Dot, the more Alexa adapts to your speech patterns and vocabulary. Using Alexa is as simple as asking a question – just ask and Alexa will respond instantly.




* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
Make everyday easier
Sleek and compact design makes Echo Dot a convenient addition to any room in the house. You can place Dot in the bedroom and use it to play music, set alarms and turn off your lights. Or put it in the living room to check news, sports scores, calendar, and movie show times. Or use it in the kitchen to set timers, add items to lists and shop for millions of products on Amazon just using your voice.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your music
Echo Dot streams music from Amazon Prime Music, JioSaavn, Gaana, Hungama Music and TuneIn - just ask for your favorite artist or song, or request a specific genre or mood. Search for music by album, decade, or let Alexa pick the music for you. Or wake up to your favorite music by setting a musical alarm. With Amazon Prime Music, you can also create and manage your personal playlist.
Pay your Bills with Alexa
With Alexa you can pay your utility Bills -  Electricity Bill, Mobile Phone, Gas Bill, Internet Bill, Water Bill and more with one voice command. Just ask, "Alexa pay my bill." You can also check and add to your Amazon Pay Balance.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Can hear you across the room
Echo Dot can hear you from across the room, even in noisy environments, or while playing music as it has four microphones that use beam-forming technology and enhanced noise cancellation. When you want to use Echo dot, simply say the wake word “Alexa” and it responds instantly.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Voice control your home
Use Echo Dot to switch on the geyser before getting out of bed or dim the lights from the couch to watch a movie – all without lifting a finger or even raising your voice. Echo Dot works with compatible smart home devices - either Wi-Fi based or those that ship with their own hub.
With “Routines”, control multiple devices at scheduled times or with a single voice command, like switch on the AC and turn off the lights every night.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa Communication
Use Echo Dot to call or message anyone who has an Echo device or the Alexa app. Just ask Alexa to place a call to Mom or send a quick voice message to a friend.
You can broadcast anything to all your Echo devices. Just say “Alexa, announce that I am heading home” from your Alexa app and your family will know. Instantly connect with other Echo devices in your home, or your closest family and friends. To get started, download the Alexa app on iOS and Android.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Stock up with Alexa
When you are running low on household essentials, Alexa makes it easy to refill your fridge or replenish your pantry. You can add everything from dry-fruits to AA batteries to your Amazon Cart, reorder favorite products from Amazon, and ask Alexa the status of your recent Amazon orders.


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Alexa has skills
Alexa has more than 30,000+ skills and counting. Skills add capabilities to your Echo device. Skills can help you stay updated with the latest news, request a ride from Ola, listen to All India Radio and more. Create your own personal skills and custom responses with Alexa Skills Blueprints. Just say “Alexa, help me get started with skills“.\




* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Technical Details


* This Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen Smart Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description:
Reconnect Mickey Blast Box BT Speaker Series 100

Sounds better together

Magnificent music all around

SMART FEATURES
Optimize your listening experience
Beoplay M5 can easily be set up with the Bang and Olufsen App for your smartphone. You can also use the app to to optimize the sound of your wireless speaker with presets based on different placements: Corner, wall or free-standing.

Let it blend in or stand out
Beoplay M5 combines warm fabric and cool aluminium for a visually stunning appearance. The cover for the round speaker is produced by renowned Danish textile manufacturer, Kvadrat. It’s made from woven wool and is carefully designed to enhance acoustics.

name: Crossloop AKORN 5W Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Long 8 Hours Battery Life, Superior Base, AUX Input, Dust & Splash Proof, in Built Mic with Attached Carry Strap (Nebula Blue)
description:
*  This Crossloops Akron Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sturdy, Modern, and Portable
Crossloop AKORN is the next-generation Bluetooth speaker that delivers surprisingly powerful stereo sound. This compact speaker is powered by a 600 MaH rechargeable Li-ion battery that offers 6 hours of continuous, high-quality audio playtime. Sporting durable, waterproof, and dustproof fabric materials, AKORN is the all-purpose, all-weather companion that takes the party everywhere. It also features a 5-watt audio output for crystal clear conference calls and thumping Bollywood beats.


*  This Crossloops Akron Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Sleek and Stylish
This ultra-compact Bluetooth speaker in a lightweight, stylish design is super portable. Whether you’re lounging around the house or doing outdoor activities, take the Crossloop AKORN with you anytime, anywhere. Also, it can be easily slipped into your backpack or bag, take the sound with you wherever you want to go.


*  This Crossloops Akron Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Water Proof and Dust Proof
Crossloop AKORN 5W Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker Water and dustproof Bluetooth speaker is resistant to splash, rain, snow, mud, and more. You can enjoy music in the shower room, by the poolside or beach, and even in the rain. It can float on water, you don't even need to worry about it dropped into the water by accident. AKORN is your perfect partner for outdoor sports, travel, bicycle, cycling, climbing, camping, hiking, running, fishing, golf cart, etc.,


*  This Crossloops Akron Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Hands-Free Operations
Crossloop AKORN enables you to enjoy your free time but still be able to answer calls without even reaching for your phone. You just have to press a button and the speakerphone is activated, and when you end your call, the music will continue playing as nothing happened. Control the volume by pressing the +/- button and change your tracks by double-clicking on the +/- buttons. No Bluetooth device? No worries. Simply, connect a 3.5mm audio cable in AUX-IN Jack.


*  This Crossloops Akron Bluetooth Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Klipsch Reference Theatre Pack 5.1 Channel Speaker,Black
description: We've taken the premium materials and acoustic technology of our coveted Reference Series and designed a beautiful 5.1 surround sound system to pair with your favorite A/V receiver. Complete with a wireless subwoofer, the Reference Theater Pack brings the Klipsch cinematic sound into your home with an incredibly minimal footprint. CINEMATIC PERFORMANCEThe Reference Theater Pack delivers superior acoustic   performance by leveraging Injection Molded Graphite (IMG)   woofers. These exceptionally lightweight cones are extremely rigid   – providing remarkable low frequency response, with minimal cone   breakup and distortion. A Linear Travel Suspension (LTS) tweeter minimizes distortion for   enhanced, detailed performance. LTS tweeters have been a   hallmark of our Reference series product lines, making it a core   component of some of the best speakers in the world.  * This Klipsch MM Speaker Reference Theatre Pack 5.0 image is for   illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.  HORN-LOADED POWEROur exclusive Tractrix Horn Technology and aluminum tweeters   deliver the most impressive high-end response and greater   extension, enhanced imaging and powerful dynamics. This creates   the cleanest, most natural sound possible.  * This Klipsch MM Speaker Reference Theatre Pack 5.0 image is for   illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.  WIRELESS, ROBUST BASSThe down-firing wireless subwoofer is designed to deliver   room-filling low frequencies without requiring too much floorspace.   The 2.4GHz connectivity allows for premium, CD-quality sound   anywhere in the room. Simply connect the compact, pre-paired   transmitter to the subwoofer or LFE out on your receiver and place   the subwoofer where it sounds and fits best in your room. The   built-in all-digital subwoofer amplifier delivers ample power with   high efficiency and true-to-source accuracy.  * This Klipsch MM Speaker Reference Theatre Pack 5.0 image is for   illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.  FLEXIBLE SYSTEM PLACEMENTTo complement the easy placement of the wireless subwoofer,   each satellite speaker has a keyhole mount and a ¼” x 20 threaded   insert (the center channel has dual keyhole / inserts) for maximum   mounting flexibility.  * This Klipsch MM Speaker Reference Theatre Pack 5.0 image is for   illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

The integrated WaveGuide focuses the high frequency sound for dynamic, true-to-life reproduction, while the rear-firing port allows for better low frequency extension.

name: Jamo Studio 8 S801 Bookshelf Speaker with WaveGuide Acoustic Technology, Walnut
description:
The S 801 bookshelf speaker features a 2.54 cm (1 inch) soft dome tweeter for smooth, refined high frequencies, with a 10.16 cm (4 inch) polyfiber woofer for balanced, musical low end. The integrated WaveGuide focuses the high frequency sound for dynamic, true-to-life reproduction, while the rear-firing port allows for better low frequency extension.

SMALL CABINET, BIG SOUND
The compact cabinet of the S 801 allows for extremely versatile placement options, whether it’s part of a high performance home cinema, or standing alone as a 2-channel listening system in a chic, fashionable living space.Engineered to belie its small cabinet size, the S 801 is specifically designed to provide exceptional output and balanced, full sound in any application despite it’s small stature.

* This Jamo S 801 BOOKSHELF SPEAKER image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

COMPLETELY NEW, COMPLETELY MODERN
The new Jamo Studio 8 series has been completely reimagined to live seamlessly in modern, premium environments. Contemporary material and finish choices accentuate the clean, minimalist lines of this European design, while the compact cabinet designs are an ideal solution for urban living environments around the world.

* This Jamo S 801 BOOKSHELF SPEAKER image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

MAGNETIC GRILLE
Fully magnetic grille – no mounting holes or push pins – for a clean, minimalistic front baffle design, while the large woven linen grille cloth creates visual interest with heavy texture.

* This Jamo S 801 BOOKSHELF SPEAKER image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

ORGANIC FEATURES
Wood accents give handcrafted, natural look

* This Jamo S 801 BOOKSHELF SPEAKER image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: boAt Stone 170 Bluetooth Speaker with Up to 6 hours of Playtime, IPX6 Waster Resistance, HD Immersive Sound, Travel and Party Booster, bluetooth 5.0, Integrated controls, portable and lightweight design, Electric Blue
description:
Stone 170
The game of portability just got a boost with the boAt Stone 170 best bluetooth speaker, flip your scene anywhere anytime with the full 5W’s of power. A compact, lightweight and IPX 6 Water Resistant design makes it the perfect companion for a number of sceneries. Stay prepared with the boAt Stone 170. It is packed with a 1800mAh battery, with a push of up to 6 hours of playtime per listening session. So set the mood and accentuate the vibe with the boAt Stone 170. Pick your method of access with Wireless Bluetooth V5.0 and an SD card slot making it perfect for all situations. Extremely simple to navigate, utilize the integrated controls to access a wide range of functions. This includes True Wireless Function, meaning that you can set up two at the same time.
Premium HD Sound
For audiophiles that love catching every snare and snap with that deep booming bass that allows for a memorable listening experience on the power output of 5W’s.

* This boAt Stone 170 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Up To 6 hours of Musical Extravaganza
That allows you to step to the street and keep the beats banging, with a powerful 1800 mAh Lithium Battery, slip into the rhythm of your music.

* This boAt Stone 170 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Lightweight and Portable
Compact and lightweight - this boAt speaker is ideal to carry along with you without hassles.

* This boAt Stone 170 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This boAt Stone 170 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

description:

Your first encounter with Phantom will likely be memorable. Feel the power of black Phantom II 95 dB. Sound this rich and clear from a speaker this compact is simply unrivaled. Phantom II will move you, even at low volume. Touch controls give you total command of Phantom II with a single stroke.
0 distortion
0 saturation
0 background noise

name: Xiaomi L05G Smart Speaker with IR Control and 360 Degree Surround Sound, Black
description:
* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
IR Control
Turning ON the Not-So-Smart Products
Tired of looking for the remote at night to control the temperature of AC or fan remote is nowhere to be found.
Now, with the combination of a built-in IR transmitter and Google Assistant, operate the conventional home devices with your voice without disturbing your comfort.


* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
LED Clock Display
Uninterrupted Time for your Dime
The Speaker comes with LED clock making it easier to keep track of time displayed big and bold in front of the speaker. The clock is fused with adaptive brightness which adjusts to the light in the room and DND mode to completely hide the time during a scheduled time

* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Unparalleled Design
Design made to blend in with surrounding and giving a subtle, minimalistic look to your already beautiful home.
A perfect piece of technology and a work of art made for your home


* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Just Say Ok Google
True Assistant for All Your Needs
With Xiaomi Smart Speaker, you can easily enjoy music at home just with your voice. You can play your favorite music, control volume and find information about the song that you are listening to, hands-free. You can also plan your day, set alarms and control smart devices around your home -- just by using your voice.

* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Get Better of the Interruptions
Controlling smart home irrespective of brands has never been this easy. With all-new intelligent voice control, bind a plethora of devices and just say the word.



* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Takes Two to Tango
Behold a completely immersive experience when you combine two devices of the same model to form a stereo. Indulge yourself in the sonorous stereo sound field freely.

* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Skipping Interruptions
Going an extra mile or two with Xiaomi Smart Speaker. Connect multiple smart speakers together for home-wide synchronous playing and even for hands-free calls with Google Duo

* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Chromecast built-in for audio
Simply tap the cast button from apps you already know and love to stream from your phone, tablet or laptop to your speaker using Chromecast built-in. Enjoy playing music, podcasts or news via Bluetooth with smooth transmission.



* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.


* This Xiaomi L05G Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beosound A1 2nd Gen 2.1 Channel Speaker, Anthracite Oxygen
description:
* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Perfectly portable
Size-defying sound
Call-ready
SIZE-DEFYING AUDIO
Sound you'll want to share
With enough volume to fill a room, Beosound A1 punches way above its size. It has the largest bass woofer you'll find in this type of compact speaker, delivering punchy low end and great dynamics. And its round shape spreads sound in every direction so everyone can tune in.

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CLASS-LEADING BATTERY
Lots of time for play
With up to 18 hours of playtime, chances are you'll tap out before Beosound A1 does. Depending on volume level, this little speaker can keep the garden party or marathon meeting going for hours. Without missing a beat.

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CRYSTAL CLARITY
Always on call
Three microphones - positioned at the top for greater clarity - make Beosound A1 the perfect speakerphone for catchups and meetings alike. And with Alexa Voice Assistant, it's now even easier to interact: pick a song, plan your day or check the weather without lifting a finger.

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
RELIABLE CONNECTION
No fuzzy business
Musical fidelity? It's all down to a seamless, solid connection. Beosound A1 features Bluetooth 5.1 technology, which means a better connection that uses less energy. And with Microsoft Swift Pair and Google Fast Pair, you connect even faster to your devices.

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PARTNER IN SOUND
From the pool to the penthouse
Grab it and go. Or hang it on the wall. Beosound A1 has been specifically crafted to move with you and fit in just about anywhere. From cooking in the kitchen to cooking in the sun, the fully dust and waterproof IP67 construction means you don't have to worry about any of life's thrills or spills.

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Elegance. On or off.
Brushed, perforated aluminium. High-grade water-repellent leather. And almost a century of craft. Beosound A1 is an enticing speaker design that manages to stand out while fitting in.
DURABLE ALUMINIUM SHELL

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
VERSATILE LEATHER STRAP

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
DISCRETE, INTUITIVE CONTROLS

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HOME OFFICE
Your personal assistant
Make the most of your day. Beosound A1 is Microsoft Zoom Certified, which means that every aspect of online presence is faster, clearer and more intuitive. Add rich and immersive sound to the mix, and you've got the recipe for seamless and effective work sessions.

* This BEOSOUND A1 2ND GEN Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beosound Explore Speaker, Black Anthracite
description:
* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Tough and weatherproof
Crafted for go-time
Plays for days
MADE TO LAST
When it's no walk in the park
Breaking new ground or walking the beaten path? It's all the same to the sturdy Beosound Explore. Inside the scratch-resistant, anodised aluminium shell, a vertical rib structure provides serious protection from bumps. We design and craft the speaker by hand in Denmark, because that's the only way we meet our strict standards.



* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
TRAVELLING COMPANION
Dunes. Glaciers. And beyond.
Bring your music into the wild. Beosound Explore is designed to perform under extremes, and it's just as intuitive to use as your other trusted gear. Clip it on your backpack or hang from your belt. Or lodge it in a cliff-side alcove. The rubber base keeps the speaker steady on most surfaces. Just grab it. And hit the trail.

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
HIGH-PERFORMANCE BATTERY
Energy for the road
Beosound Explore takes you there and back again. With up to 27 hours of playtime, this speaker is ideal for those off-the-grid adventures where power is in short supply. And it never compromises on sound quality.



* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
DUST AND WATERPROOF
Brave the elements
Life on the road is wet. And sunny. And windy. And dirty. But with a fully dust and waterproof IP67 construction, Beosound Explore turns any environment into a playground. Just brush it off or wash it in a stream, then you're good to go again.



* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
CONNECTIVITY
Always connected
Wherever you go, music follows. The latest in Bluetooth and Fast Pairing means that your favourite tunes are never more than a tap away. The waterproof controls are glove-friendly and easy to use - even when fastened to your backpack.



* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker video is for illustration purpose only.
A seasoned traveller
Inspired by the sturdy simplicity of traditional outdoor gear, Beosound Explore is crafted to follow you for years on end.
LIGHTWEIGHT AT 631 G

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
FLEXIBLE, WATERPROOF STRAP

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
STRONG ALUMINIUM CARABINER

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
GRAB-AND-GO SHAPE

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
EASY, GLOVE-FRIENDLY BUTTONS

* This BEOSOUND EXPLORE Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Saregama Carvaan Gold Hindi SC130 Bluetooth Speaker with 5000 Pre-Loaded Songs, Rose Gold
description:
* This Saregama Carvaan Gold Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
Description
A beautiful metallic body, a treasure trove of 5000 old Hindi songs and crystal clear sound, bring home the Saregama Carvaan Gold with iconic Harman Chardon sound.
The 5000 pre-loaded songs are categorized into stations based on lyricists, actors, singers, music composers, specials. Each music station can be selected by turning a jog-dial. With the turn of a knob switch from Kishore Kumar classics, to R.D Burman's pulsating hits, to songs picturised on the angry young man - Amitabh Bachchan and other legends of Hindi Cinema. In addition, you can enjoy an array of specially curated stations like Romance, Sad, Gurbani, Kapoors, Ghazal, Bhakti and many more. Carvaan Gold also houses Ameen Sayani's Geetmala countdown collection spanning 50 years.

* This Saregama Carvaan Gold Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

You can also enjoy your personal collection of songs by plugging in a USB drive. Alternatively, you can connect your phone or tablet to Carvaan Gold using Bluetooth or an AUX IN cable. Carvaan Gold also has AM/FM making it the go to music system in your home.
Download the 'Saregama Carvaan' app on your Android or iOS mobile phone to view the entire list of 5000 songs on Carvaan Gold, search a song, artiste or album and create playlists with your favourite songs. Carvaan Gold works on a rechargeable battery that lasts for approximately 5 hours.
With its premium retro look, extensive content library, and ease-of-use, Saregama Carvaan Gold with sound by Harman Chardon is the perfect gift to buy for yourself or your loved ones.

name: Bose SoundTouch Wireless Wi-Fi Speaker with Remote Control, White
description: Bose sound is one touch away. Now you can stream Internet radio, music services and your music library at the touch of a button. If you have a Wi-Fi network at home, you're ready to enjoy Bose sound with the Sound Touch Portable Wi-Fi music system. It delivers clearer, fuller sound than you thought you could get from a speaker this small. The rechargeable lithium-ion battery keeps the music playing for hours, and the portable design means you can easily take the system from room to room. With Sound Touch, Internet radio and music services are built right into the system, so you don't need to rely on other devices to play personal favorites. That means you can put your tablet away, or leave your phone in your pocket, and still stream the music you love.

name: Marshall Stanmore III Bluetooth Speaker with Volume Control Knob, Brown
description:
HOME-FILLING SOUND
Stanmore III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, delivering home-filling Marshall signature sound that has been re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation of Stanmore has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room. Dynamic Loudness adjusts the tonal balance of the sound to ensure your music sounds brilliant at every volume.
 
* This Marshall Stanmore 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
PAIR, PLAY AND TURN IT UP
Stanmore III is straight to business, so you can just pair and play without the hassle of a complex set-up. You’ll find everything you need right there on the unit so you can easily control your music without ever picking up your device.
 
* This Marshall Stanmore 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
NEXT-GENERATION BLUETOOTH
Stanmore III is ready for the future of Bluetooth technology and has been built to deliver next-generation Bluetooth features the moment they are available. Over the Air (OTA) updates via the app ensure that your speaker is always up-to-date with the latest software and features. This future-proof technology will deliver higher audio quality, while increasing streaming range and improving audio sync.
 
* This Marshall Stanmore 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC DESIGN THAT STANDS APART
Marshall has taken its signature rock ’n’ roll home speaker line-up and given it a stripped-back look that makes a loud statement. Its iconic design knocks all other speakers off the shelf. Signature details such as the Marshall script and brass control knobs adorn the speaker, echoing the legacy of rock ’n’ roll. Choose the finish that fits you – original Black, vintage Cream or relaxed Brown.
 
* This Marshall Stanmore 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
A MORE SUSTAINABLE APPROACH
Stanmore III has music at heart and the environment in mind. This new generation takes a more sustainable approach with a PVC-free build that comprises 70% recycled plastic and only vegan materials.
 
* This Marshall Stanmore 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CONNECT THE WAY YOU WANT
With next-generation Bluetooth 5.2, the RCA input and the 3.5 mm input, connecting to Stanmore III and getting the right sound has never been so effortless. Connect to your speaker directly from your device the way you want to.
 
* This Marshall Stanmore 3 Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Marshall Acton II Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker with Multi-host Functionality, Brown
description:
THE SMALL BUT MIGHTY WORKHORSE
Acton II may be compact, but its sound is nothing short of large. It delivers a well balanced, powerful audio experience, yet can fit in the tiniest of spaces.

* This Marshall Acton II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
LARGER THAN LIFE SOUND
Acton II may be compact, but its sound is nothing short of large. It delivers a well balanced, powerful audio experience, yet can fit in the tiniest of spaces.

* This Marshall Acton II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
WIRELESSLY CONNECT
Bluetooth 5.0 provides a superior wireless sound at a range of up to 30 feet while maintaining connectivity. Use your Bluetooth enabled smartphone, tablet or computer to stream music directly to your speaker with no wires required.

* This Marshall Acton II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC MARSHALL DESIGN
This speaker combines contemporary technology with iconic Marshall design to deliver hard-hitting sound while retaining a classic look. You’ll want to proudly display this speaker in any room.

CUSTOMISE YOUR SOUND
Fine-tune your music to meet your requirements. Just use the Marshall Bluetooth app or the analogue controls on your speaker’s top panel to perfect your sound according to the room you’re in.

WIRED CONNECTIVITY

MULTI-HOST FUNCTIONALITY
This speaker features multi-host functionality so you can easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth devices. Now you and a friend can take turns playing what you want to hear.

MARSHALL BLUETOOTH APP

name: Marshall Woburn II Bluetooth Multimedia Speaker with Multi-host Functionality, Brown
description:
THE POWERFUL PERFORMER
The largest speaker from Marshall, Woburn II features a robust sound and hits high trebles cleanly, handles low bass with ease and has a clear, lifelike mid range.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
LARGER THAN LIFE SOUND
Woburn II hits high trebles cleanly, handles low bass with ease and has a clear, lifelike mid range. Two 1 inch tweeters and dual 5.25 inch subwoofers are individually powered by class D amps for a total of 110 watts of power. The wooden cabinet construction helps provide a warm, natural sound and the bass reflex system includes a port to increase efficiency at low frequencies.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
WIRELESSLY CONNECT
Bluetooth 5.0 and aptX technology provides lossless wireless sound at a range of up to 30 feet (10 metres) while maintaining connectivity. Use your Bluetooth enabled smartphone, tablet or computer to stream music directly to your speaker with no wires required.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
ICONIC MARSHALL DESIGN
Classic Marshall details such as a textured vinyl covering, salt and pepper fret and the iconic script logo adorn this speaker’s sturdy wooden frame. Located on the front of the speaker is a brass plate, etched with the establishment date of 1962 - a subtle nod to the brand’s heritage and 60 years of loud. You’ll want to proudly display this speaker in any room.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
CUSTOMISE YOUR SOUND
Fine-tune your music to meet your requirements. Just use the Marshall Bluetooth app or the analogue controls on your speaker’s top panel to perfect your sound according to the room you’re in.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
WIRED CONNECTIVITY
There are more ways to connect than just Bluetooth 5.0. Plug into the RCA or 3.5 mm input for an analogue listening experience.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MULTI-HOST FUNCTIONALITY
This speaker features multi-host functionality so you can easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth devices.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.
MARSHALL BLUETOOTH APP
In addition to the analogue control knobs, you can use the Marshall Bluetooth app to customize your listening experience or control the music you’re listening to. Use the app to switch between EQ presets, and adjust the intensity of the LED lights on the top panel. You can also wake up your speaker or put it into standby mode in a matter of seconds.

* This Marshall Woburn II Speaker image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

name: Portronics iLUMI Portable LED Lamp with Bluetooth Speaker, Color Changing LED Mood Light, Built-in Mic for Calls (White)
description: 2w Led Lamp With 3w Speaker: This one-of-a-kind LED lamp cum Speaker has three brightness settings and a built-in Wireless Bluetooth speaker for streaming music from your tablet or smart phone.One-Touch Operation: By pressing the mesh-top of the lamp cum speaker, you can easily adjust brightness levels and LED color combinations. The 3W speaker's sound quality is both soothing and strong.Multicolor Led Lights: Choose from 5 color choices in this Multi-Color LED lamp with 3 Brightness Levels to suit your mood. You may opt to make the LEDs flash to the rhythm of the song.Hand Free Calling Bluetooth Speaker with Lights: With its built-in microphone and 3W powerful speaker, you can take phone calls on the gadget totally hands-free.Sturdy, Portable & Rechargeable: The musical lamp has a 5V USB rechargeable battery and is very compact, so you can have it with you and make your evenings memorable, your studies more fun and productive, and your power cuts more enjoyable.
